translated_evidence: Scientists at the Molecular Biotechnology Institute of the Austrian Academy of Sciences developed “mini-heart” organs using human multi-power stem cells, known as “heart classes”, which can organize themselves for a heart-shaped structure without the need for an experimental scaffolding and can beat themselves autonomously.

claim: 磁共振引导聚焦超声脑部系统（Exablate，Neuro）获得中国国家药品监督管理局的批准。
evidence: Insightec医视特磁共振引导聚焦超声脑部系统（Exablate® Neuro）于2021年初获得中国国家药品监督管理局的上市批准，此前在2016年获得美国FDA批准，2012年获得欧洲CE认证。该技术也被称为“磁波刀”，为患者提供了一种无创、磁共振成像引导的丘脑手术。 记者24日获悉，一种新的治疗“磁波刀”——磁共振引导聚焦超声脑部系统(Exablate Neuro)获得中国国家药品监督管理局的批准，正式上市。
translated_claim: The Magnetic Resonance-led Ultrasound System (Exablate, Neuro) was approved by the China National Drug Control Authority.
translated_evidence: Insightec was listed by the China National Drug Surveillance Authority in early 2021, followed by the United States FDA in 2016 and the European CE in 2012. The technology, also known as the “magnetic wave knife”, provides patients with an incisive, magnetic resonance imaging-led mound brain operation.

claim: 金砖国家炎症性肠病联盟国际办公室“花落”上海。
evidence: 中新网上海5月24日电 (记者 陈静)记者24日获悉，金砖国家炎症性肠病联盟国际办公室落户上海交通大学医学院附属仁济医院。
translated_claim: The international office of the BRICS National Union for Inflammational Intestinary Diseases “Flowed down” in Shanghai.
translated_evidence: On 24 May, a journalist (journalist Chen Jing) was informed that the International Office of the BRICS National Union for Inflammational Intestinary Diseases was housed at the Indignity Hospital attached to the Medical School of the Shanghai Transport University.

claim: “一带一路”医院创新发展国际高峰论坛在广州举行。
evidence: “一带一路”医院创新发展国际高峰论坛5月21日至22日在广州举行。
translated_claim: The International Summit Forum on Innovative Development of Hospitals, “One Way” was held in Guangzhou.
translated_evidence: The International Summit Forum on Innovative Development of Hospitals “One Way” was held in Guangzhou from 21 to 22 May.

claim: 每周工作超55小时心脏病致死风险增加。
evidence: 世卫组织和劳工组织对长时间工作导致的生命和健康损失进行了首次全球分析，据它们估计，2016年，由于每周至少工作55小时，致使39.8万人死于中风，34.7万人死于心脏病。 在有记录的死亡人数中，大多数在60至79岁之间死亡，且其45至74岁期间的工作时间为每周55小时或以上。  该研究的结论认为，与每周工作35至40小时相比，每周工作55小时或以上的人患中风的风险估计增加35%，死于缺血性心脏病的风险增加17%。
translated_claim: The risk of death from heart disease increases over 55 hours a week.
translated_evidence: WHO and ILO carried out their first global analysis of the loss of life and health resulting from long hours of work, which estimated that in 2016, 398,000 people died of strokes and 347,000 died of heart disease as a result of working at least 55 hours a week. Most of the recorded deaths occurred between 60 and 79 years of age and worked 55 hours or more a week between 45 and 74 years of age.

claim: 截至2020年底，广东已组建16235支家庭医生团队。
evidence: 2016年，我国开始正式实行家庭医生签约服务制度，截至2020年底，广东已组建16235支家庭医生团队，为重点人群2091万人提供家庭医生签约和健康管理服务。
translated_claim: By the end of 2020, 16235 teams of family doctors had been formed in Guangdong.
translated_evidence: In 2016, the family doctor contract service was officially introduced. By the end of 2020, 16235 family doctor teams had been formed in Guangdong, with 2,091 million persons in the focus group providing family doctor contract and health management services.

claim: 5月18日，“健康中国—MMC西部行”在兰州启动，为糖尿病等代谢疾病进行健康宣教、义诊和医护培训。
evidence: 致辞中，宁光院士指出，作为本次MMC西部行的第一站，兰州云集了我国 MMC 16家优秀中心的专家、甘肃省及西部地区的著名专家教授一起进行糖尿病等代谢疾病的健康宣教、义诊和医护培训，为西部地区带来健康的福利，提高整个地区的医疗水平，为健康中国作出了贡献。
translated_claim: On 18 May, “Healthy China - MMC West Bank” was launched in Lanzhou to provide health education, counselling and medical training for metabolic diseases such as diabetes.
translated_evidence: In his message, Mr. Ning Guangkai stated that, as the first stop of this MMC Western tour, Yun, Lanzhou, together with experts from 16 MMC centres of excellence in our country, leading experts from Gansu Province and the western region, had conducted health education, counselling and medical training on metabolic diseases such as diabetes, which had brought health benefits to the western region, raised the level of health care throughout the region and contributed to a healthy China.

claim: 上海是在中国率先试点家庭医生制度的城市。迄今，上海累计签约超过815万人。
evidence: 上海是在中国率先试点家庭医生制度的城市。 记者18日获悉，迄今，上海累计签约超过815万人，老年人、儿童、慢性病人、孕产妇等重点人群签约率超过77%，失能老人签约率超过九成。
translated_claim: Shanghai is the first city in China to pilot the family doctor system. To date, more than 8.15 million people have been signed in Shanghai.
translated_evidence: Shanghai is China’s leading city in piloting the family doctor system. Journalists learned on 18 that, to date, more than 8.15 million people have been contracted in Shanghai, with over 77% of priority groups such as the elderly, children, the chronically ill, and mothers, and over 90% of the disabled.

claim: 北京定点社区卫生服务机构2021年7月起对参保人员全面放开。
evidence: 记者从北京市医疗保障局获悉，为支持和促进分级诊疗、方便群众在社区就医，近日，北京市医保局、市卫生健康委、市民政局联合印发《关于本市基本医疗保险参保人员社区就医管理有关问题的通知》，自7月1日起，北京城镇职工和城乡居民基本医疗保险参保人员无需事先选择，可以直接到定点社区卫生服务机构就近就医，相关医疗费用按规定纳入医保支付范围。 这意味着，北京市城乡居民参保人员均可将全市所有定点社区卫生服务机构作为本人门诊首诊医疗机构，办理所需的首诊转诊服务。 通知实施后，北京所有2200余家定点社区卫生服务机构作为本市城镇职工和城乡居民参保人员共同定点医疗机构，无需选择可以直接就医。 目前，北京共有2900余家基本医疗保险定点医疗机构，按照本市基本医疗保险参保人员就医管理规定，除本人选定的定点医疗机构(含1家定点社区卫生服务机构)以外，还有32家A类定点医疗机构、164家中医定点医疗机构、160家专科定点医疗机构无需选择，可直接就医。 7月1日起，北京市2200余家定点社区卫生服务机构对参保人员全面放开，参保人员无需事先选择，可以直接持社保卡或电子医保凭证，到本市定点社区卫生服务机构就近就医并实时结算。
translated_claim: The targeted community health services in Beijing have been fully liberalized since July 2021.
translated_evidence: Journalists have been informed by the Beijing Municipal Health Insurance Board that, in order to support and promote the level of medical treatment and facilitate access to health care in the community, the Beijing Municipal Health Insurance Board, the Municipal Health Board and the Municipal Civil Administration have recently issued a circular on issues related to the management of health care in the community of persons participating in basic health insurance in the city. Since 1 July, all Beijing municipal health services have been co-located with residents of urban and rural areas without prior choice and have no direct access to health services in targeted community health services. There are currently more than 2900 basic health insurance health services in Beijing, which are covered by the regulations governing the management of health services in the city's basic health insurance, with the exception of those located in Beijing, where more than 2200 community health services are co-located with urban workers and urban and rural residents.

claim: 俄罗斯托木斯克理工大学开发出一种能够更准确地研究心脏电活动及其组织状态的设备，很容易检测出可导致心脏猝死的心肌病的早期征兆。
evidence: 俄罗斯托木斯克理工大学开发出一种能够更准确地研究心脏电活动及其组织状态的设备，很容易检测出可导致心脏猝死的心肌病的早期征兆。 俄罗斯科研人员开发的新设备，可以更准确地测量心脏的电活动，检测心肌细胞的早期病理变化，以预防心脏猝死，而无需通过复杂的手术干预。
translated_claim: The Russian University of Tomsk Polytechnic has developed a device capable of studying more accurately the state of the electrocardial activity and its organization, which easily detects early signs of myocardial disease that can cause sudden heart deaths.
translated_evidence: Russia’s Tomsk Polytechnic University has developed a device that can more accurately study the electrocardial activity and its organizational state, which easily detects early signs of myocardial disease that can cause sudden heart deaths. Russian scientists have developed new equipment that can more accurately measure the electrical activity of the heart, detect early pathological changes in myocardial cells, in order to prevent sudden heart deaths, without the need for complex surgical intervention.

claim: 长三角地区儿童青少年心理健康促进联盟16日在上海交通大学医学院附属新华医院成立。
evidence: 5月16日，长三角地区儿童青少年心理健康促进联盟正式在上海交通大学医学院附属新华医院成立，医院同时还成立了儿童青少年精神心理健康中心。
translated_claim: The Long Triangle Alliance for the Mental Health of Children and Adolescents was established in Xinhua Hospital, an affiliate of the Shanghai Transport University Medical School.
translated_evidence: On 16 May, the Long Triangle Coalition for the Promotion of the Mental Health of Children and Adolescents was officially established at the Xinhua Hospital, affiliated to the Shanghai Transport University Medical School, which also established the Centre for the Mental Health of Children and Adolescents.

claim: 中国专家将神经内镜等技术应用于脊椎手术。
evidence: 上海冬雷脑科医院神经脊柱中心主任张学军16日接受采访时表示，神经外科医生更加重视对脊髓、神经的保护，专家们创新采用神经内镜和椎间孔镜开展脊柱、脊椎手术，更加精准，患者创伤更小，恢复更快。
translated_claim: Chinese experts applied technologies such as neuroscopes to spinal surgery.
translated_evidence: During an interview on 16 June, the Director of the Neuro-Ridge Centre of the Winter-Ray Cerebral Hospital in Shanghai, Zhang Jun, stated that the neurosurgeon had placed greater emphasis on the protection of spinal cords and nerves, and that experts had innovatively operated on the spinal and spinal cords and the vertebrae with neuroscopic and invertebrates, with greater precision and less trauma and faster recovery.

claim: 身体出现4个信号，警惕急性心肌梗死。
evidence: 临床上的数据显示，70%的心梗在发病前都有大量出汗的情况，因为心输出量的大量减少和交感神经的过度活跃都会造成心脏病发作的大量出汗。 牙疼者经常伴有大汗、面色苍白、濒死感时，就应该警惕是急性心梗。 心梗的放射痛可至颈部、咽部。颈部有紧缩感，喉咙不适，呼吸不顺，并伴有出汗时，在排除呼吸道疾病后，也要考虑心梗。 室温没有变化，手脚突然发凉，这是血液循环突然变差的表现，根本原因在于心脏。
translated_claim: The body has four signals to guard against acute myocardial infarction.
translated_evidence: Clinical data show that 70% of heart attacks have a high rate of sweat prior to onset of disease, as a large reduction in heart output and hyperactivity of synergic nerves can lead to a large number of heart attacks. Toothachers should be wary of acute heart attacks, often accompanied by sweat, pale-facedness, and near-death feelings.

claim: 上海交通大学医学院附属仁济医院骨关节外科岳冰课题组发现，利用临床上最常用的非甾体抗炎药“双氯芬酸钠”(商品名如：扶他林、戴芬等)可以治疗骨关节术后感染常见耐药菌MRSA。
evidence: 研究人员发现“双氯芬酸钠”可以与相关抗生素产生协同抗菌效果，有效降低MRSA的耐药性，使其对传统的相关抗生素再敏感。 近日，上海交通大学医学院附属仁济医院骨关节外科岳冰课题组在国际著名学术期刊《尖端科学》（Advanced Science ，IF= 15.8) 在线发表关于利用临床上最常用的非甾体抗炎药“双氯芬酸钠”（商品名如扶他林、戴芬等），治疗骨关节术后感染常见耐药菌MRSA（耐甲氧西林的金黄色葡萄球菌）的最新研究成果，证实了该药物能够与β-内酰胺类抗生素产生协同抗菌效果，有效降低MRSA的耐药性，使其对传统的内酰胺类抗生素再敏感。
translated_claim: The Osteoporosis Ice Section of the University of Shanghai Transport Medical School, affiliated with the University, found that the most common clinical anti-inflammation drug, sodium dichlorophenate (commodity name, e.g. Tatlin, Daphne, etc.), could be used to treat common anti-drugs through osteoporosis.
translated_evidence: Researchers have found that sodium dichlorophenate can have a collusive antibacterial effect with related antibiotics, effectively reducing MDSA resistance and re-sensitivity to traditional related antibiotics. Recent research results from the recent study of the MRSA (goldy pulmonary fungus) common antibodies after the treatment of bone-resistances have been confirmed by a leading international academic journal, Advanced Science, IF=15.8.

claim: 无创检测系统可以不开刀，只凭脏器弹性诊断肝纤维化。
evidence: 与肝穿刺活检的有创检查相比，基于瞬时弹性成像技术的肝纤维化诊断属于无创检测，更容易得到患者认可，也降低了基层医院使用该技术的门槛，提高了我国早期肝纤维化、肝硬化的筛查率。
translated_claim: The no-infection detection system is capable of diagnosing liver fibrosis based on the elasticity of the organ.
translated_evidence: Compared to the start-up screening for liver perturbation, the liver fibrosis diagnosis, based on instant elastic imaging technology, is no more easily accepted by patients and has reduced the threshold for its use in primary hospitals, increasing screening rates for early liver fibrosis and cirrhosis in the country.

claim: 微信表情包绿头盔的小人嘴里的烟卷没了，只剩下歪嘴一笑。
evidence: 带着绿头盔的小人  嘴里的烟卷没了  只剩下歪嘴一笑
translated_claim: The little man with the green helmet has lost the cigarette in his mouth and only smiles in his mouth.
translated_evidence: The little man with the green helmet, the smoke in his mouth is gone, and all he can do is smile.

claim: 5月9日，《五百笔+承诺戒烟》线下实验艺术互动活动在北京举行。
evidence: 5月9日，由世界卫生组织驻华代表处、中国疾病预防控制中心主办，中央美术学院协办的《五百笔+承诺戒烟》线下实验艺术互动活动在灵活办公空间WeWork上东公园里社区举办。
translated_claim: On 9 May, the Experimental Art Interaction on the Line of 500 + Promises to Stop Tobacco was held in Beijing.
translated_evidence: On 9 May, an experimental art interactive event under the “500 pens + commitment to quit smoking”, organized by the WHO Representative Office in China and the China Center for Disease Prevention and Control and co-sponsored by the Central School of Fine Arts, was held in the community of Upper East Park in WeWork, a flexible office space.

claim: 31岁的小刘辗转求职终于成功，不料竟在入职体检时，查出胸主动脉有一个蟠桃大小的假性动脉瘤，。
evidence: @视觉中国大洋网讯31岁的小刘辗转求职终于成功，不料竟在入职体检时，查出胸主动脉有一个蟠桃大小的假性动脉瘤，体检医生建议到上级医院进一步诊治！
translated_claim: The 31-year-old Liu Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao was successful in finding a false aneurysm of the size of a peach in the chest artery at the time of the entry examination.
translated_evidence: @Sight China Ocean News 31-year-old Liu Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiang = @ @ @ @ China Ocean Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xi = @ @ @ @ @ China Ocean Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiao Xiang @ @ @ @

claim: 《柳叶刀·艾滋病》研究现实拉丁美洲和加勒比地区接受抗逆转录病毒治疗（ART）的人体免疫缺陷病毒（HIV）感染者，预期寿命呈显著延长趋势。
evidence: 由于世界范围内艾滋病检测及治疗服务越来越普及，拉丁美洲和加勒比地区接受抗逆转录病毒治疗（ART）的人体免疫缺陷病毒（HIV）感染者，预期寿命呈显著延长趋势。 近日发表在英国《柳叶刀·艾滋病》杂志在线版的这项研究，是迄今为止同类研究中规模最大的一项，其显示如今在上述地区，接受ART的HIV患者的预期寿命已接近普通人群的预期寿命。
translated_claim: Lancet AIDS studies the reality of people living with the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) receiving antiretroviral treatment (ART) in Latin America and the Caribbean, with a significant increase in life expectancy.
translated_evidence: As a result of the increasing availability of HIV testing and treatment services worldwide, life expectancy in Latin America and the Caribbean with antiretroviral treatment (ART) has increased significantly. This study, recently published in the online edition of the British magazine Lancet AIDS, is by far the largest of similar studies in the region, showing that the life expectancy of HIV patients receiving ART is now close to that of the general population.

claim: 《自然-衰老》最新发表一篇卫生研究论文称，短期空气污染暴露与老年男性认知功能障碍有关。
evidence: 施普林格·自然旗下专业学术期刊《自然-衰老》最新发表一篇卫生研究论文称，短期暴露(最长28天)于高水平的空气污染中与年长男性的认知功能障碍有关。 研究人员对比发现，评测前最长28天的PM2.5水平升高与参与者总体认知功能分数下降有关，即使PM2.5的水平低于一般被认为危险的水平。
translated_claim: Nature-Age recently published a health research paper stating that exposure to short-term air pollution is linked to cognitive impairments among older men.
translated_evidence: According to a recent health research paper published by the professional academic journal Schplinger Nature Ageing, short-term exposure (up to 28 days) to high levels of air pollution is associated with cognitive functional disorders among older men. Researchers compared the higher PM2.5 levels of the previous 28-day evaluation with the lower overall cognitive functional scores of the participants, even if the PM2.5 levels are below what is generally considered to be dangerous.

claim: 浙江首个重离子医学中心开建，投资11.5亿元。
evidence: 4月30日，浙江首个集医、教、研为一体的重离子医学中心，在中国科学院大学附属肿瘤医院（浙江省肿瘤医院）（以下简称国科大肿瘤医院）开工建设，标志着国科大肿瘤医院即将成为浙江唯一一家利用重离子放疗技术治疗肿瘤疾病的医院。 据了解，重离子治疗系统在国内医学科研界被称为“国之重器”，国科大肿瘤医院该项目整体投资达11.5亿元。
translated_claim: The first heavy ion medical centre in Zhejiang was opened, with an investment of $1.15 billion.
translated_evidence: On 30 April, the construction of the first Zhejiang Medical Centre, which brings together doctors, teachers, and researchers, began at the Oncology Hospital of Zhejiang Province, a subsidiary university of the Chinese Academy of Sciences (hereinafter referred to as the Great Oncology Hospital of the National Academy of Sciences), which will soon become the only hospital in Zhejiang for treatment of oncological diseases using heavy ion discharge techniques. It is understood that the heavy ion treatment system is known to be the “State's most important instrument” in the country's medical and scientific research community, with an overall investment of 1,150 million yuan in the project of the Great Oncology Hospital of the National Academy of Sciences.

claim: 流感创新药速福达获批中国上市。
evidence: 4月29日，罗氏中国宣布，流感创新药速福达（玛巴洛沙韦）获国家药监局正式批准，用于治疗12周岁及以上急性无并发症的流感患者，包括存在流感并发症高风险的患者。该药全程只需一次服药，可在24小时内停止病毒排毒。 4月29日，罗氏中国宣布，公司流感创新药速福达®（英文商品名：Xofluza®，中文通用名：玛巴洛沙韦）获得中国国家药品监督管理局正式批准，用于治疗12周岁及以上急性无并发症的流感患者，包括存在流感并发症高风险的患者。
translated_claim: Influenza Influenza Ideal was approved for listing in China.
translated_evidence: On April 29, Rhodes China announced that the company's Innovative Influenza was officially approved by the National Drug Control Service to treat people with influenza at age 12 and above, including those at high risk of influenza complications. The drug only needs to be administered once, and the virus can be detoxed within 24 hours. On April 29, Rhodes China announced that the company's Innovative Influenza was officially approved by the Chinese National Drug Surveillance Authority to treat people at age 12 and above who have no acute complications, including those at high risk of influenza complications.

claim: 2021年4月29日，上海市免疫治疗创新研究院揭牌。
evidence: 人民网上海4月29日电 （唐小丽）今天，上海市免疫治疗创新研究院在上海交通大学医学院附属仁济医院揭牌成立。
translated_claim: On 29 April 2021, the City of Shanghai Institute for Innovations in Immunotherapy was inaugurated.
translated_evidence: On April 29, the People's Network called " Tang Xiao Ri ", the Shanghai City Institute for Immunotherapy Innovation was inaugurated today at the Gents Hospital, a subsidiary of the Shanghai Transport University School of Medicine.

claim: 广州启动呼吸健康万人早筛公益活动，35岁以上免费查肺。
evidence: 近日，在“善心呼吸健康万人早筛”公益活动启动仪式上，国家呼吸医学中心办公室主任梁文华和广州呼吸健康研究院肺功能检测中心主任高怡分别抛出一组令人“触目惊心”的数据，并呼吁市民关注肺部疾病的早筛。
translated_claim: In Guangzhou, an early screening campaign for people with healthy respiratory conditions has been launched, and lung screening is free of charge over 35 years of age.
translated_evidence: In recent days, at the launch of a public service event entitled “Observantly Healthy People's Early Screening”, the Director of the National Centre for Respiratory Medicine, Liang Wenhua, and the Director of the Centre for Psychiatry of the Guangzhou Institute for Respiratory Health, Koichi, respectively, have published a “frighteous” set of data and called attention to early screening of pulmonary diseases.

claim: 降糖新药诺和泰在华获批，一周一次给药为患者减负，兼顾降糖与护心。
evidence: 记者29日获悉，国家药品监督管理局(NMPA)批准了诺和泰(司美格鲁肽注射液)在中国的上市申请。 这意味着，中国2型糖尿病患者将实现一周一次给药，强效控糖，进而获得更加有效、简便、安全的治疗选择。
translated_claim: The new sugar and Thai drugs were approved in China and given to patients once a week to reduce their burden, balancing sugar and care.
translated_evidence: The journalist was informed on 29 that the National Drug Surveillance Authority (NMPA) had approved applications for listing in China for No and Tai (Smegrum injection fluid). This means that China’s type 2 diabetes patients will be given medication once a week, with a strong effect on sugar, leading to more effective, easy, and safe treatment options.

claim: 浙江省首例人工心脏植入患者出院。
evidence: 2021年4月28日，人工心脏植入患者出院，这是浙江省的第一例，也是该类人工心脏正式上市后的华东地区首例。
translated_claim: The first artificial heart implant in Zhejiang province was discharged.
translated_evidence: On 28 April 2021, the patient was discharged from hospital with artificial heart implants, the first case in Zhejiang province and the first case in the region following the official listing of this type of artificial heart.

claim: 葛洪医药遗产在广东罗浮山得到传承，已研制180多个医药品种。
evidence: 始建于1970年的罗浮山国药传承葛洪医药遗产，不断挖掘和继承古代医药精华，利用罗浮山丰富的中草药资源，研制及生产出罗浮山百草油等180多个品种，具有极强的市场竞争力。
translated_claim: The Ghón pharmaceutical heritage was inherited in the mountains of Guangdong, and more than 180 medical varieties have been developed.
translated_evidence: The Pharmacy of the Roofau nation, which was founded in 1970, inherited the medical heritage of Gaehong, continuously excavating and inheriting the essence of ancient medicine, using its rich resources of medium herbs, and developing and producing more than 180 varieties, such as herb oil, which are highly competitive in the market.

claim: 北京市肿瘤防治研究办公室出版的《2020北京肿瘤登记年报》表示：恶性肿瘤发病率上升，死亡率下降。
evidence: 2017年北京市户籍居民恶性肿瘤新发病例50070例，发病率为367.88/10万，10年间年均变化百分比为2.11%，呈上升趋势，尤其是甲状腺癌、女性乳腺癌和结直肠癌发病率明显增长。 全市恶性肿瘤死亡率为191.38/10万，10年间年均变化百分比为-1.06%，死亡率的下降和北京市整体癌症诊断和治疗水平的提高有重要的关系，也和甲状腺癌和女性乳腺癌在癌症患者里所占比例提高有关，这两种癌症的治疗效果较好。
translated_claim: The Beijing Annual Register of Oncology 2020, published by the Oncology Research Office of the City of Beijing, states that the incidence of malignant tumours has increased and mortality has decreased.
translated_evidence: In 2017 there were 50070 new cases of malignant neoplasms among residents of the urban household in Beijing, with a prevalence rate of 3.6788/10 million and an average annual change rate of 2.11 per cent over 10 years, with a marked increase in the incidence of thyroid, breast and colon cancers, in particular among women. The incidence of malignant neoplasms in the city as a whole was 191.38 per 100,000, with an average annual change of -1.06 per cent over 10 years. The decline in mortality is significantly related to the increase in the overall level of cancer diagnosis and treatment in Beijing, as well as to the increase in the proportion of thyroid cancer and breast cancer among women among cancer patients.

claim: 发表在《科学》杂志上的一项研究称，DNA复制时序维持细胞表观遗传状态。
evidence: 近日发表在《科学》杂志上的一项研究称，美国佛罗里达州立大学大卫·吉尔伯特博士带领的研究团队回答了一个60年未解的科学谜题：DNA的复制时序维持着人类细胞中全局的表观遗传状态。 在过去60年里，科学家已经能够观察到遗传信息的复制方式和时间，并确定了“复制时序程序”的存在，该程序控制着DNA片段的复制时间和顺序，但仍无法解释为什么会有这样一个特定的程序存在。
translated_claim: According to a study published in Science magazine, DNA reproduction time sequences maintain cytomorphological genetic state.
translated_evidence: According to a recent study published in Science magazine, the research team led by Dr. David Gilbert, Florida State University, United States, answered a 60-year-old scientific puzzle: the reproductive sequence of DNA sustains the landscape of human cells. Over the past 60 years, scientists have been able to observe the way and time of reproduction of genetic information and have identified the existence of a “reproducing time sequence” that controls the time and sequence of reproduction of DNA fragments, but it is not possible to explain why such a particular procedure exists.

claim: 上海交通大学医学院附属仁济医院泌尿科薛蔚教授与上海交通大学生物医学工程学院张春富教授合作研究获得新成果——外源性热触发铁死亡策略，有望为前列腺癌治疗提供新途径。
evidence: 记者27日获悉，上海交通大学医学院附属仁济医院泌尿科薛蔚教授与上海交通大学生物医学工程学院张春富教授合作研究获得新成果——外源性热触发铁死亡策略，有望为前列腺癌治疗提供新途径。
translated_claim: Professor Xuewei, urinary hospital attached to the Medical School of the Shanghai Transport University, in collaboration with Professor Zhang Chunfu, Faculty of Biomedical Engineering of the Shanghai Transport University, has developed new results - the external thermal trigger iron death strategy, which is expected to provide new avenues for prostate cancer treatment.
translated_evidence: The journalist was informed on 27 July that Professor Xuewei, urinary hospital attached to the Medical School of the Shanghai Transport University, in collaboration with Professor Zhang Chunfu of the School of Biomedical Engineering of the Shanghai Transport University, had developed new results - the external thermal trigger iron death strategy, which was expected to provide new avenues for prostate cancer treatment.

claim: 国家卫生健康委医政医管局局长焦雅辉27日在发布会上介绍，恶性肿瘤的5年生存率已经从10年前的30.9%提升到目前的40%提高近10%。
evidence: 她也表示，根据国家癌症中心统计数据显示，随着中国医疗质量和诊疗能力的提升，恶性肿瘤的五年生存率已经从十年前的30.9%提升到目前的40.5%，提高了近10个百分点。 国家卫健委医政医管局局长焦雅辉27日指出，随着我国医疗质量和诊疗能力的提升，恶性肿瘤的五年生存率已经从十年前的30.9%提升到目前的40.5%，提高了近10个百分点，某些恶性肿瘤比如食管癌，五年生存率已经高于美国等发达国家。
translated_claim: At the launch meeting of the Director General of the National Health Council's Medical Administration, Jojafhui 27, it was reported that the five-year survival rate of malignant tumours had risen from 30.9 per cent 10 years ago to nearly 10 per cent at present.
translated_evidence: According to the National Cancer Centre’s statistics, the five-year survival rate of malignant tumours has risen from 30.9% to 40.5% today, as China’s medical quality and capacity has improved. As the Director of the National Health Service’s Medical Administration, Yoja Fai, noted on 27th day, the five-year survival rate of malignant tumours has risen from 30.9% to 40.5% today, up by almost 10 percentage points, with some malignant tumours, such as dietary cancer, already higher than in developed countries like the US.

claim: 成年人接种新冠疫苗间接保护儿童，建议应种尽种。
evidence: 郑慧贞建议，成人要应种尽种，要建立起群体免疫屏障，人群接种率需达到75%-85%。 “成年人打了疫苗以后，不仅保护自己，也间接保护了咱们的孩子。”
translated_claim: The immunisation of adults with a new crown vaccine indirectly protects children, and it is recommended that every effort be made.
translated_evidence: Zheng Hye-zhung suggested that adults should do everything in their power to create a mass immunization barrier that would have to reach 75 to 85 per cent of the population. “When adults are vaccinated, they protect not only themselves, but also, indirectly, our children.”

claim: 截止至2021年，上海连续11年无本地感染疟疾病例，维持消除疟疾状态。
evidence: 界面新闻从上海市卫健委获悉，上海已连续11年无本地感染疟疾病例，维持消除疟疾状态。
translated_claim: As of 2021, there had been no endemic cases of malaria in Shanghai for 11 consecutive years, maintaining the elimination of malaria.
translated_evidence: The interface news was informed by the Shanghai City Health Commission that for 11 consecutive years there had been no endemic cases of malaria in Shanghai and that malaria eradication had been maintained.

claim: 首期“基层医务工作者社会工作与风险防控远程培训项目”将在湖北试点开展，预计将有7500名湖北基层医务工作者参与培训。
evidence: 首期“基层医务工作者社会工作与风险防控远程培训项目”将在湖北试点开展，聚焦5G技术在医疗领域的应用，提高医务工作者服务社区居民和应对突发公共卫生风险的能力。 预计将有7500名湖北基层医务工作者参与此次培训。
translated_claim: The first project on distance training for grass-roots medical workers in social work and risk prevention and management will be piloted in Hubei, where 7,500 grass-roots medical workers are expected to participate.
translated_evidence: The first project on distance training for grass-roots medical workers in social work and risk prevention and management will be piloted in Hubei, focusing on the application of 5G technologies in the medical field, enhancing the capacity of medical workers to serve community residents and respond to sudden public health risks, with the participation of 7,500 grass-roots medical workers from Hubei expected to take part in the training.

claim: 浙大儿院在新疆共建心脏中心，医疗援疆救助大病患儿。
evidence: 中新网杭州4月23日电(张煜欢)23日，新疆乌鲁木齐儿童医院心脏中心学科共建项目签约仪式在杭州举行。 项目由浙江大学医学院附属儿童医院(下称浙大儿院)联合福棠儿童医学发展研究中心、爱佑慈善基金会、乌鲁木齐儿童医院共同发起，通过“医疗+慈善”创新模式，依托浙大儿院一对一带教方式，按照专业心脏中心的建设标准为乌鲁木齐儿童医院制定系统性的提升方案，配套成组医、护、技协作培养。 浙大儿院党委书记舒强表示，此次合作将以医疗援疆的方式，帮助乌鲁木齐儿童医院打造心脏中心，力争留下一支带不走的心脏医疗团队，逐步实现“先天性心脏病患儿不出省”的目标。
translated_claim: The Zhejiang Children's Centre is built in Xinjiang to provide medical assistance to patients.
translated_evidence: The co-sponsorship of the joint project for the co-construction of the Heart Centre of the Xinjiang Urumqi Children’s Hospital was held in Hangzhou on 23 April, in the State of Ninjiang, co-sponsored by the Children’s Hospital attached to the Zhejiang University Medical School (hereinafter the Zhejiang Children’s College), the Fukugi Children’s Medical Development Research Centre, the Awe Charity Foundation, and the Urumqi Children’s Hospital, through the innovative model of “medical + charity” to develop a systematic upgrading programme for the Urumqi Children’s Hospital, in accordance with the construction criteria of the professional heart centre, in conjunction with the organization of medical, nursing, and technical collaboration.

claim: 2021年12月30日，埃及将加入金砖国家新开发银行 期待加强与新兴经济体合作。
evidence: 新华社开罗12月29日电（记者吴丹妮马尔瓦·叶海亚）埃及财政部长马伊特29日发表声明说，埃及将加入金砖国家新开发银行，这意味着埃及经济发展得到充分肯定，埃及期待与其他新兴经济体和发展中国家加强合作。 马伊特在声明中说，埃及是多边主义的坚定支持者，金砖国家新开发银行是埃及加强与其他新兴经济体和发展中国家合作的新平台。 埃及期待未来在基础设施建设、可持续发展等领域与相关国家和机构夯实伙伴关系。
translated_claim: On December 30, 2021, Egypt will join the BRICS New Development Bank and looks forward to increased cooperation with emerging economies.
translated_evidence: Xinhua Society, in Cairo, on December 29, Egypt’s finance minister, Mait, (journalist U Thani Marwa Yahya), stated that Egypt’s accession to the BRICS New Development Bank meant that Egypt’s economic development was well recognized, and that Egypt looked forward to closer cooperation with other emerging economies and developing countries. Mait said in his statement that Egypt was a strong supporter of multilateralism, and that the BRICS New Development Bank was a new platform for Egypt to strengthen its cooperation with other emerging economies and developing countries.

claim: 2021年12月30日，中国驻达沃总领事赴“雷伊”重灾区北苏里高移交中方援菲救灾物资。
evidence: 中国驻达沃总领事赴“雷伊”重灾区北苏里高移交中方援菲救灾物资12月28日，中国驻达沃总领事黎林（右三）前往菲律宾北苏里高省省会苏里高市，移交救灾物资。 中国驻达沃总领馆摄中新网马尼拉12月30日电(记者关向东)中国驻达沃总领事黎林28日前往菲律宾北苏里高省省会苏里高市，代表中国政府向领区内遭受超强台风“雷伊”影响损失最重的北苏里高省政府移交中国援助救灾物资，北苏里高省长拉诺·马图加斯、副省长艾迪·加图朗基、苏里高市长埃内斯托·马图加斯等出席交接仪式。
translated_claim: On 30 December 2021, the Chinese Consul-General in Davao travelled to the “Rey” disaster-stricken area of North Surigo to deliver Chinese relief supplies.
translated_evidence: On 28 December, China’s Consul-General in Davao travelled to Surigo, North Sudan, in the disaster-stricken area of “Rey” to deliver relief supplies to the Chinese side, and China’s Consul-General in Lelin (right-third) in the capital of the province of North Surigo, in the Philippines, in order to deliver relief supplies. The Chinese Consulate-General in Davao took pictures of the Chinese Consulate-General in Manila on 30 December (journalist in the east) and the Chinese Consul-General in Davo travelled to Surigo, in the capital of the province of North Surigo, on behalf of the Chinese Government, to the government of the province of North Surigo, which suffered the most severe loss of relief and relief supplies from China, with the participation of the Governor of North Surigo, Rano Matugas, the Deputy Governor, Eddie Gaturanki, and the Mayor of Surigo, Ernesto Matusas, among others.

claim: 2021年12月30日，被指参与性虐未成年女孩 爱泼斯坦前女友5项罪名成立。
evidence: 中国新闻网中新网12月30日电据美国中文网报道，美国亿万富豪爱泼斯坦的前女友兼长期同伙吉斯莱恩·麦克斯韦(GhislaineMaxwell)，日前被陪审团裁定五项罪名成立。 她被指控参与了爱泼斯坦在1994年至2004年间性虐待未成年少女。
translated_claim: On 30 December 2021, he was convicted of five counts of participatory abuse of a minor girl, Eppstein's former girlfriend.
translated_evidence: On December 30, China’s news network Newcom reported on the United States Chinese Internet that Ghislaine Maxwell, a former girlfriend and long-time associate of billionaires in the United States, had been convicted by a jury of five charges. She was accused of being involved in the sexual abuse of underage girls by Eppstein between 1994 and 2004.

claim: 2021年12月30日，俄乌关系紧张美航母不敢撤 拜登普京月内将第二次通话。
evidence: 俄乌关系紧张美航母不敢撤 拜登普京月内将第二次通话综合报道，俄乌局势紧张之际，俄罗斯总统普京和美国总统拜登30日将举行本月内第二次通话，美官员称，拜登将告诉普京，存在降低乌克兰紧张局势的外交可能性。 为防局势生变，美国“杜鲁门”号航母也将在欧洲延期驻留。 局势高度紧张普京拜登将再通话白宫29日表示，美国总统拜登将于30日下午与俄罗斯总统普京通话。
translated_claim: On December 30, 2021, the Russian-Ukrainian carrier was afraid to withdraw the second call from Biden Putin in the month.
translated_evidence: As Russian President Putin and US President Biden speak for the second time this month, officials say that Biden will tell Putin that there is a diplomatic possibility of reducing tensions in Ukraine. In order to prevent a change in the situation, the US carrier Truman will extend its presence in Europe.

claim: 2021年12月29日，中国驻达沃总领事赴“雷伊”重灾区移交中方援菲救灾物资。
evidence: 中国驻达沃总领事赴“雷伊”重灾区移交中方援菲救灾物资中新社马尼拉12月29日电(记者关向东)中国驻达沃总领事黎林28日前往菲律宾北苏里高
translated_claim: On 29 December 2021, the Consul-General of China in Davo went to the “Rey” disaster-stricken area and handed over relief supplies from the Chinese side.
translated_evidence: The Chinese Consul General in Davao went to the “Rey” disaster-stricken area to deliver Chinese relief supplies to China's Central News Agency (CNC) in Manila on December 29th (journalist to the east) and the Chinese Consul General in Davao, Lelin on December 28th to Surigo, North Philippines

claim: 2021年是“一带一路”项目八周年 探访中巴经济走廊2021年成就。
evidence: 2021年是“一带一路”倡议提出8周年，也是中巴经济走廊建设的第8年。 作为“一带一路”倡议的旗舰项目，中巴经济走廊在2021年可谓是成果丰硕，在电力基础设施建设、产业园区建设、民生项目建设等方面都取得了重大成绩。 中巴经济走廊帮助巴基斯坦克服了能源危机，它还帮助巴基斯坦建立了连接巴中以及本地区的现代化基础设施。 我们希望正在建立的经济特区将有助于为巴基斯坦带来工业投资，同时，随着在工业化以及农业、科学技术和扶贫方面的合作，中巴经济走廊的好处将惠及巴基斯坦所有地区。
translated_claim: The year 2021 marks the eighth anniversary of the "One Way" project, visiting the 2021 achievements of the China-Pakistan economic corridor.
translated_evidence: As the flagship project of the “one-way” initiative, the China-Pakistan economic corridor, which in 2021 proved to be fruitful, has achieved significant results in the areas of electricity infrastructure, industrial parks, and livelihood projects. The China-Pakistan economic corridor helped Pakistan overcome the energy crisis, and it helped Pakistan to build modern infrastructure linking Pakistan to Pakistan and the region.

claim: 2021年12月29日，印度德里医生持续罢工12天 患者无法就医情绪激动。
evidence: 印度德里医生持续罢工12天患者无法就医情绪激动印度首都医生游行中遭警方粗暴对待海外网12月29日电印媒称，印度德里住院医师持续罢工12天，几乎所有主要政府医院的服务都受到了影响，当地患者无法就医，情绪激动。 据《印度快报》报道，当地时间28日，情况进一步恶化，几所小医院也开始支持罢工，以抗议警察的粗暴行径。 这也引发了患者的不满，部分情绪激动的患者开始敲打玻璃柜台。47岁的患者桑德·瑞姆（SunderRam）称，在过去几个月以来，他一直在接受医院的糖尿病和高血压治疗，无法登记看病意味着他拿不到医生的处方，从而无法开药。 另一名伤寒患者索努·卡诺加（SonuKanojia）和患有癫痫的侄子一直睡在医院急诊部外，“等待罢工结束”。
translated_claim: On December 29, 2021, doctors in Delhi, India, continued to strike for 12 days and patients were unable to access medical attention.
translated_evidence: According to Dr. Delhi’s continuous 12-day strike, patients were not able to protest police brutality. It also provoked complaints from patients, some of whom began beating glass counters. A 47-year-old patient, Sanderram, said that he had been receiving diabetes and hypertension treatment in hospitals for 12 days, and that his inability to register a disease meant that he had no access to a doctor and was therefore unable to prescribe drugs.

claim: 中国国药新冠疫苗成玻利维亚接种最多疫苗。
evidence: 中国国药新冠疫苗成玻利维亚接种最多疫苗中新网12月29日电据南美侨报网报道，12月26日，由中国政府捐赠的300万剂中国国药(Sinopharm)新冠疫苗运抵玻利维亚，中国国药新冠疫苗成为玻利维亚接收最多、使用最多的新冠疫苗。 中新社记者蒋启明摄据报道，玻利维亚外交部负责外贸和一体化的副部长本杰明·布兰科(BenjamínBlanco)表示，随着玻利维亚航空(BoA)的飞机从北京抵达科恰班巴的豪尔赫威尔斯特曼国际机场(JorgeWilstermanndeCochabamba)，玻利维亚近日已累计收到中方捐赠的350万剂新冠疫苗。 布兰科补充说，加上新到的这批疫苗，玻利维亚全国共收到1200万剂中国国药新冠疫苗，这意味着该疫苗成为玻利维亚接种最多的疫苗，也是占比最高的疫苗，达58%。
translated_claim: The new crown vaccine, administered by the Chinese medicine, was the largest vaccine in Bolivia.
translated_evidence: On 26 December, 3 million doses of the Sinopharm new crown vaccine donated by the Chinese Government arrived in Bolivia, and the Chinese brand vaccine became the most widely received and used new crown vaccine in Bolivia. According to the South American Journal, the Vice-Minister for Foreign Affairs of Bolivia for Foreign Trade and Integration, Benjamín Blanco, has reported that, with the arrival of the Bolivian Aviation (BoA) aircraft from Beijing to the Jorge Wilstermann de Cochabamba International Airport in Cochabamba, Bolivia has recently accumulated 3.5 million doses of the new crown vaccine donated by China.

claim: 哈萨克斯坦2022年将担任独联体轮值主席国。
evidence: 根据会议决定，哈萨克斯坦将担任2022年独联体轮值主席国，下次独联体国家元首理事会会议将于2022年10月在哈首都努尔苏丹举行。
translated_claim: Kazakhstan will assume the chairmanship of CIS in 2022.
translated_evidence: It was decided that Kazakhstan would assume the chairmanship of CIS in 2022 and that the next meeting of the CIS Council of Heads of State would be held in the Sudan, the capital of the country, in October 2022.

claim: 2021年12月29日，韩外长证实韩美已就终战宣言文本达成协议。
evidence: 韩外长证实韩美已就朝鲜半岛终战宣言文本达成协议，“尚属首次”韩联社报道截图[环球网报道]据韩联社报道，韩国外交部长官郑义溶29日在韩外交部大楼与记者座谈时表示，韩美双方实际上已就朝鲜半岛终战宣言的文本达成协议。 图自韩联社韩联社称，韩国外交高官证实有关终战宣言磋商实已收尾，尚属首次。 报道介绍，郑义溶当时说，韩美已就终战宣言的重要性形成共识。
translated_claim: On 29 December 2021, Foreign Minister Han confirmed that Korea and the United States had reached agreement on the text of the Final Declaration.
translated_evidence: Foreign Minister Han confirmed that Korea and the US have agreed on the text of the Korean Peninsula Final War Declaration, and that “the first-ever” WFK report [the Global Network report] reported that, in talks with journalists in the South Korean Foreign Affairs Department building, Korea’s Foreign Minister, Jung Yi-won, 29, stated that the two sides had actually agreed on the text of the Korean Peninsula Final War Declaration. According to WFK, it is the first time that South Korean high-ranking diplomatic officials have confirmed that negotiations on the Final War Declaration have ended.

claim: 日本人健康寿命创纪录：女性超75岁，男性近73岁。
evidence: 中新网12月29日电据日本放送协会(NHK)29日报道，日本厚生劳动省调查称，关于表示身体健康的状态下生活时间的“健康寿命”，2019年时，日本女性为75.38岁，男性为72.68岁，全部刷新了纪录。 日本厚生劳动省3年一度对日本全国约20万户家庭进行调查，并公布估值。 2019年，日本人女性“健康寿命”为75.38岁，男性为72.68岁，与自开始统计的2001年相比，女性增加了2.73岁，男性增加了3.28岁。
translated_claim: The Japanese have a record healthy life: over 75 years of age for women and nearly 73 years for men.
translated_evidence: The Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare of Japan survey reported on 29 December that, in 2019, 75.38 years of age for Japanese women and 72.68 years for men were recorded as “healthy life” for the duration of life in a state indicating physical health; the Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare of Japan conducted a three-year survey and published an evaluation of approximately 200,000 households throughout Japan; in 2019, the “healthy life” for Japanese women was 75.38 years, compared with 72.68 years for men, an increase of 2.73 years for women and 3.28 years for men as compared with the 2001 statistics.

claim: 2021年12月29日，英国日增新冠确诊病例近13万例再创新高。
evidence: 新华社伦敦12月28日电（记者郭爽）据英国政府28日公布的疫情新数据，该国当天新增新冠确诊病例近13万例，再创疫情暴发以来最高纪录。
translated_claim: On 29 December 2021, the United Kingdom witnessed an increase in the number of new confirmed cases of nearly 130,000.
translated_evidence: According to the new outbreak data released by the British Government on 28 December, Xinhua Society in London (Reporter Kwok) added nearly 130,000 new confirmed cases on that day, the highest number ever since the outbreak.

claim: 2021年12月29日，中国驻挪威使馆：立陶宛改正错误方能走出困局。
evidence: 中新社柏林12月29日电奥斯陆消息：针对挪威外交大臣维特费尔特近日就个别议员关于中国和立陶宛关系质询的答复，中国驻挪威使馆发言人28日回应称，希望挪方明辨是非，一如既往地秉持客观公正的立场看待有关问题。 发言人强调，立陶宛改正错误方能走出困局。
translated_claim: 29 December 2021, Chinese Embassy in Norway: Lithuania can only get out of this situation by correcting its mistakes.
translated_evidence: In response to a recent response from the Norwegian Foreign Secretary, Vitfeldt, to a question from individual parliamentarians about relations between China and Lithuania, the spokesman for the Chinese Embassy in Norway responded on 29 December, saying that he hoped that the mover would make it clear and, as always, view the issue with objectivity and impartiality. He stressed that Lithuania could only get out of the trap by correcting its mistakes.

claim: 2021年12月29日，意大利新冠确诊日增近8万例！政府考虑缩短隔离时间。
evidence: 中新网12月29日电据意大利欧联网援引欧联通讯社报道，意大利新冠疫情形势持续严峻。 当地时间28日，意大利民防部报告，意大利新增新冠确诊病例78313例，面对疫情的快速蔓延，意大利正在考虑缩短新冠感染者的密切接触者隔离时间。
translated_claim: On 29 December 2021, Italy's new crown was increasingly diagnosed in nearly 80,000 cases. The Government is considering reducing the period of isolation.
translated_evidence: On December 29, China-News Network quoted the European Union News Agency as saying that the new crown epidemic in Italy continues to be critical. On November 28, local time, the Italian Ministry of Civil Defence reported 78,313 new confirmed cases in Italy. In the face of the rapid spread of the epidemic, Italy is considering reducing the time-segregation of close contact with the new crown.

claim: 美鹿群中至少检测到3种新冠病毒变体 白尾鹿可能成为新冠病毒库。
evidence: 国际战“疫”行动    科技日报北京12月28日电 （记者张梦然）据近日英国《自然》杂志发表的一项研究，科学家在美国俄亥俄州东北部数个地点自由放养的白尾鹿中检测到至少3种新冠病毒变体 之前由美国农业部领导的研究显示了野鹿体内存在抗体的证据。 此次新研究首次报告，实验室中病毒分离株的生长支持白尾鹿新冠感染活性，这表明研究人员已经恢复了新冠病毒的可行样本，而不仅仅是它的遗传痕迹。 鲍曼说，白尾鹿作为新冠病毒库，可能会导致两种结果：该病毒可能在鹿体内发生变异，从而促进新毒株向其他物种（包括人类）传播；或者该病毒可以感染鹿而不发生变异，同时继续在人类中进化，并且在某些时候，人类对感染鹿的毒株没有免疫力时，这些变体可能会蔓延回人类。
translated_claim: At least three new coronary virus variants have been detected in the herds.
translated_evidence: According to a recent study published in the British magazine Nature, scientists detected evidence of antibodies in at least three new coronary virus variants before the US Department of Agriculture was released in several locations north-east of Ohio. This new study reported for the first time that the growth of a virus-separated strain in a laboratory supported the new coronary infection, suggesting that researchers had recovered viable samples of the new coronary virus, not just its genetic traces.

claim: 北约称2021年在欧洲空域拦截俄罗斯军机290次。
evidence: 北约称2021年在欧洲空域拦截俄罗斯军机290次中新社布鲁塞尔12月29日电(记者德永健)北约28日称，2021年北约战机共在欧洲空域拦截“不明身份飞机”约370次，其中290次为拦截俄罗斯军机。 北约当日在一份公告中通报上述数据，不过未公布有关俄罗斯军机的更多详情，仅称多数拦截发生在波罗的海上空。
translated_claim: NATO reported 290 interceptions of Russian military aircraft in European airspace in 2021.
translated_evidence: According to NATO, in 2021, there were 290 interceptions of Russian military aircraft in European airspace on 29 December in Brussels by the SCN (journalist De Yongjian) NATO 28 that in 2021 NATO warplanes intercepted “unidentified aircraft” in European airspace some 370 times, of which 290 were stopped by Russian military aircraft. NATO reported the above data in a circular on the same day, although no further details about Russian military aircraft were published, stating only that most of the interceptions took place over the Baltic Sea.

claim: 2021年12月29日，美国单日新增新冠确诊病例超51万例 创疫情以来新高。
evidence: 新华社华盛顿12月28日电（记者谭晶晶）美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学发布的最新统计数据显示，全美27日新增新冠确诊病例超过51万例，达512553例，为疫情暴发以来单日新增病例最高纪录。
translated_claim: On December 29, 2021, more than 510,000 new confirmed cases were added in the United States on a single day.
translated_evidence: According to the latest statistics released by Xinhua News, Washington, D.C., on 28 December, Johns Hopkins University in the United States, more than 510,000 new cases were diagnosed on 27 September, the highest ever since the outbreak.

claim: 2021年12月29日，法国公布严厉抗疫举措：仅允许接种完全部疫苗者进入餐厅等场所。
evidence: 法国总理卡斯泰27日在巴黎召开的记者会上表示，法国抗疫的支柱依然是推动民众积极接种疫苗，这可以让政府减少一些限制性措施，比如宵禁或要求商店关门，从而减少对经济的伤害。 尽管法国没有像荷兰那样“封城”，但也新推出一些严厉措施：如进入餐厅、电影院和其他场所须出示“健康通行证”，且仅允许接种完全部疫苗的人进入；将禁止在咖啡厅和酒吧内站立饮食，仅允许在固定餐桌座位用餐；企业尽可能让员工一周至少3天居家办公，持续至少3周等。
translated_claim: On 29 December 2021, France announced a strict anti-epidemic initiative: only fully vaccinated persons are allowed to enter places such as restaurants.
translated_evidence: French Prime Minister Castile, at a press conference held in Paris on 27 September, stated that France’s anti-epidemic pillar remained the promotion of active vaccination, which would allow the government to reduce restrictions, such as curfews or the closure of shops, thereby reducing economic harm. Although France did not “seal the city,” as the Netherlands did, severe measures were introduced: access to restaurants, cinemas, and other places required a “health pass” and allowed only those who were vaccinated in full; food would be banned from standing in cafés and bars and allowed to eat only in fixed table seats; businesses would, as far as possible, keep employees at home for at least three days a week, lasting at least three weeks.

claim: 2021年12月29日，美疾控中心发布报告称已有75艘邮轮暴发新冠疫情。
evidence: 当地时间12月27日晚，美国疾控中心发布一份报告称，目前有至少75艘邮轮暴发了新冠疫情，该部门正在对其进行调查、观察和监控。 报告显示，目前疾控中心正在对36艘船只上的疫情扩散情况进行调查，另有32艘船只的调查已经结束并处于进一步观察中。
translated_claim: On 29 December 2021, the Center released a report that 75 cruise ships had a new crown outbreak.
translated_evidence: On the evening of 27 December, local time, the United States CDC released a report that at least 75 cruise ships are currently experiencing a new coronary outbreak, which the Department is investigating, observing, and monitoring. Reports indicate that CDC is currently investigating the spread of the epidemic on 36 vessels, and that 32 more have been completed and are under further observation.

claim: 2021年12月28日，中国援柬中柬友谊医疗大楼项目竣工验收。
evidence: 12月28日，由中国建筑集团承建的援柬埔寨中柬友谊医疗大楼项目顺利通过竣工验收，中柬友谊再添标志性工程。
translated_claim: On 28 December 2021, the China-Cambodia Friendship Medical Building project was completed and accepted.
translated_evidence: On 28 December, the project to assist the Chinese-Cambodian Friendship Medical Complex, which was carried out by the Chinese Construction Group, was successfully completed and received, and Chinese-Cambodian friendship was re-marked.

claim: 日本争取2020年代后半段实现日本宇航员登月。
evidence: 日本“力争2020年代后半期实现日籍航天员登月”，成为继美国后第二个载人登月的国家。 据日本共同社28日消息，日本28日修订其太空探索计划时间表，打算到本世纪20年代后期将一名日本人送上月球。
translated_claim: Japan aims to achieve the arrival of Japanese astronauts in the second half of the 2020s.
translated_evidence: According to the 28-day news of the Japan Commons, Japan revised its space exploration program schedule to send a Japanese man to the moon by the late 20’s.

claim: 2021年12月28日，希腊一天发生三次地震 最高震级5.4级。
evidence: 中国新闻网2021-12-2814:14中新网12月28日电据希腊《中希时报》报道，当地时间12月26日，希腊克里特岛海域先后发生5.2级和5.4级地震。 此外，当天下午首都雅典附近也发生了一次地震，震级4.0级。 据希腊地球动力研究所自动计算，当地时间12月26日17时15分，克里特岛海域发生5.2级地震，震中位于卡索斯岛以南46公里处，震源深度8.9千米。 同日20时59分，克里特岛海域发生5.4级地震，震源深度10千米。
translated_claim: On December 28, 2021, Greece experienced three earthquakes a day with a maximum seismic level 5.4.
translated_evidence: On December 28, China News Network 2021-12-2814, the Chinese News Network reported that on December 26, local time, there had been earthquakes of 5.2 and 5.4 on the waters of the Greek island of Crete, in addition to an earthquake of 4.0 on the afternoon near the capital city of Athens, which, according to the Greek Geodynamic Research Institute, automatically calculated that on December 26, local time, at 1715 hours, there had been an earthquake of 5.2 on the sea of the island of Crete, at a depth of 8.9 km south of the island of Kasos. At 2059 hours on the same day, there had been an earthquake of 5.4 on the sea of the island of Crete, at a depth of 10 km.

claim: 美俄北约将在2022年1月举行会谈 聚焦乌克兰问题。
evidence: 中新网12月28日电据外媒报道，美国白宫官员表示，美国和俄罗斯将在2022年1月10日举行安全会议，讨论乌克兰不断加剧的紧张局势等问题。 白宫发言人还表示，俄罗斯和北约组织将在1月12日举行会谈。
translated_claim: NATO will meet in January 2022 to focus on Ukraine.
translated_evidence: On December 28, China and the New China Network reported by the external media that United States White House officials had indicated that the United States and Russia would hold a security meeting on 10 January 2022 to discuss issues such as the rising tensions in Ukraine, and that Russian and NATO talks would take place on January 12th.

claim: 2021年12月28日，以色列空袭叙利亚拉塔基亚港 造成部分集装箱起火。
evidence: 中国新闻网中新网12月28日电据外媒报道，当地时间28日早上，以色列战机朝叙利亚拉塔基亚港口了数枚发射导弹。 据报道，叙利亚国家通讯社(SANA)援引一名匿名军官的话称，数枚导弹击中了港口的集装箱区，导致一些集装箱起火。
translated_claim: On 28 December 2021, an Israeli air strike on the Syrian port of Latakia set parts of the container on fire.
translated_evidence: On 28 December, the Chinese news network’s new network reported by outside media that, on the morning of 28 local time, Israeli warplanes fired several missiles at the Syrian port of Latakia. The Syrian National News Agency (SANA), citing an anonymous officer, reportedly claimed that several missiles hit the container area of the port, causing a number of containers to fire.

claim: 2020年日本老年人受虐待事件创新高 25人因此死亡。
evidence: 很角色時報很角色時報很角色時報據日本放送協會(NHK)報導，日前，據日本厚生勞動省統計，2020年日本老年人受家人或看護設施等虐待的事件數量，創有統計以來的新高。 報導稱，日本厚生勞動省在全國范圍內，對家庭和老年人看護設施等進行了關於老年人受虐待情況的調查。 結果顯示，2020年，該國老年人受虐待事件超17000件，比2019年增加逾350件。 其中，有25名老年人因受虐待死亡。
translated_claim: Twenty-five people died as a result of the innovative high number of elderly abuse incidents in Japan in 2020.
translated_evidence: According to the role-playing Times, the role-playing Times reported that Japan’s NHK reported that in 2020, Japan’s Ministry of Health, Labour, Labour, and Welfare had recorded an increase in the number of cases of abuse of Japanese older persons, such as abuse by family members or care facilities. The Ministry of Health, Labour, and Welfare conducted a nationwide survey on abuse of older persons, including family and care facilities for older persons.

claim: 2021年12月28日，拜登签署7700亿美元的2022财年国防授权法案。
evidence: 中新网12月28日电据路透社报道，白宫27日表示，美国总统拜登签署了2022财年的国防授权法案(NDAA)，该法授权了7700亿美元的国防开支。 据报道，本月早些时候，美国参议院和众议院都以压倒性多数投票通过该法案，民主党和共和党都大力支持这个为国防部制定政策的年度立法。
translated_claim: On 28 December 2021, Biden signed the defence authorization bill for a fiscal year of $2022, which is $770 billion.
translated_evidence: China-News Network reported on December 28 that on December 27, the White House stated that US President Biden had signed the 2022 Defense Authorization Act (NDAA), which had authorized $770 billion in defence spending. Earlier this month, the United States Senate and the House of Representatives reportedly voted overwhelmingly for the bill, and both the Democratic Party and the Republican Party strongly supported the annual legislation that established policies for the Department of Defense.

claim: 2021年12月28日，“谨慎而充满希望” 新一轮伊核谈判在维也纳开启。
evidence: “谨慎而充满希望”新一轮伊核谈判在维也纳开启中新网12月28日电据外媒报道，当地时间12月27日，伊朗核问题全面协议联合委员会在维也纳举行第八轮谈判。 分析称，此次谈判在“谨慎而充满希望”的气氛中开始。谈判已经取得了一定进展，但若要达成协议，双方仍需要做出“艰难的决定”。
translated_claim: On 28 December 2021, a new round of Iraqi nuclear negotiations was opened in Vienna, “with caution and hope”.
translated_evidence: On December 27, local time, Iran’s Joint Commission on a Comprehensive Nuclear Agreement held its eighth round of negotiations in Vienna, which, according to analysis, began in an atmosphere of “careful and hopeful” negotiations. Negotiations have made some progress, but the parties still need to make “hard decisions” if they are to reach an agreement.

claim: 2021年12月27日，第八轮美伊恢复履约谈判启动 中方：共同推动谈判取得新突破。
evidence: 12月27日，伊核问题全面协议联合委员会政治总司长级会议在维也纳举行，宣布启动第八轮美伊恢复履约谈判进程。 中国谈判代表、常驻维也纳代表王群大使率团出席。 王群指出，关于第七轮谈判，尽管有不同的解读，但中方同大多数参与方一样，都认为谈判取得了积极的成果。 王群最后表示，中方将继续坚定支持美伊恢复履约谈判进程，建设性参与后续谈判，与各方一道努力推动谈判取得成果。
translated_claim: On 27 December 2021, the eighth round of U.S.-Iraq compliance negotiations was resumed.
translated_evidence: On 27 December, at a meeting at the level of chief political officer of the Joint Commission on the Comprehensive Iraqi Nuclear Agreement, it was announced that the eighth round of the US-Iraq negotiating process would resume. China’s negotiator and permanent representative in Vienna, Ambassador Wang Qun, was represented.

claim: 2021年12月28日，英欧“北爱尔兰议定书”谈判进展迟缓。
evidence: 人民网－人民日报欧盟委员会副主席马罗什・谢夫乔维奇近日发表声明说，在“北爱尔兰议定书”实施问题上未见英国方面的诚意。 由于担心英方可能会不断提出更多其他要求，欧盟拒绝修改议定书内容，要求在原有框架下寻找解决方案，包括降低检查频率及简化相关程序等，但未被英方接受。 英国国务大臣弗罗斯特近日发出警告称，如果谈判最终无法取得突破，英方将考虑单方面暂停议定书的执行。
translated_claim: On 28 December 2021, the negotiation of the British-European “Northern Ireland Protocol” was slow.
translated_evidence: The People’s Network-People’s Daily Council’s Vice-President, Marosh Ševčević, recently issued a statement that there was no sign of good faith on the part of the British side regarding the implementation of the Northern Ireland Protocol. Fearing that the British side might continue to make additional demands, the European Union refused to amend the Protocol’s content and to seek solutions within the existing framework, including reducing the frequency of inspections and simplifying related procedures, but it was not accepted.

claim: 2021年12月28日，伊拉克最高法院批准国民议会选举最终结果。
evidence: 伊拉克联邦最高法院批准本届国民议会选举结果当地时间12月27日下午，伊拉克联邦最高法院发布消息，法院已批准本届国民议会选举最终结果，并驳回了对于选举结果的上诉。 按照伊拉克宪法，大选结果获批后，新一届议会应当在15日内召开首次会议，选出议长和两名副议长。
translated_claim: On 28 December 2021, the Supreme Court of Iraq approved the final results of the elections to the Council of Representatives.
translated_evidence: In the afternoon of 27 December, when the Iraqi Federal Supreme Court approved the results of the elections to the current National Assembly, the Iraqi Federal Supreme Court issued news that it had approved the final results of the elections to the current National Assembly and rejected the appeal against the results of the elections, and that, in accordance with the Iraqi Constitution, the new Parliament should meet for the first time within 15 days to elect its President and two Vice-Presidents.

claim: 2021年12月28日，德国累计确诊超700万、死亡11万 多州收紧防疫措施。
evidence: 德国累计确诊超700万、死亡11万多州收紧防疫措施中新社柏林12月27日电（记者彭大伟）德国疾控机构27日公布的数据显示，该国累计确诊感染新冠病毒病例数已突破七百万，因感染新冠死亡的人数则已于日前突破十一万。 当天，德国巴符州、下萨克森州等多州宣布开始实施限制人际接触等较此前更为严厉的防疫措施。 为应对奥密克戎变异毒株可能引发的新一波疫情，德国联邦政府与各州在圣诞节前达成决议，从本月28日起升级防疫措施。
translated_claim: On 28 December 2021, cumulatively, more than 7 million people were diagnosed and 110,000 died in Germany.

On that day, several states, including the provinces of Baquhu and Lower Saxony, announced the introduction of more severe quarantine measures, such as restrictions on interpersonal contact, than before.

claim: 2021年12月27日，日本部分地区持续强降雪 交通受阻。
evidence: 新华社东京12月27日电（记者姜俏梅）受强冷空气和冬季气压分布影响，日本西部地区27日继续遭遇强降雪，交通受到严重影响。 据日本气象厅消息，受大规模强冷空气影响，靠近日本海一侧地区近日持续降雪，其中兵库县朝来市和滋贺县彦根市24小时降雪量刷新了观测史上最高纪录。 罕见暴雪给交通带来严重影响。 交通线路积雪导致彦根市一辆试运行电车27日下午脱轨，所幸车上人员并未受伤。 暴雪还造成日本国内大面积航班停运，东海道新干线、山阳新干线部分路段出现晚点情况。

Very rare snowstorms have had a serious impact on traffic.

claim: IMF：韩国经济规模有望连续三年保持全球第十。

claim: 美国是贩卖人口和强迫劳动的重灾区。
evidence: 近日，美国佐治亚州24名美国公民因涉嫌贩卖人口、强迫劳动等犯罪行为被起诉。 据非营利机构“美国农场工人就业培训计划”估计，美国至今仍有约50万童工从事农业劳作，很多孩子从8岁开始工作，每周工作长达72小时。 美国“里士满正义倡议组织”称，美国是世界上贩卖妇女和儿童现象最严重的国家之一，每年被贩卖的儿童超过10万名，其中许多人被贩卖到“血汗工厂”、遭受性剥削或家庭奴役。 美国国务院2018年承认，美国是强迫劳动、奴役受害者的来源国、中转国和目的地国，合法和非法行业都存在贩卖人口情况。

The United States Department of State recognized in 2018 that the United States is a country of origin, transit and destination for victims of forced labour, slavery, and trafficking in human beings, both legal and illegal.
