Kim Jianxi said that I had made a mistake in balancing my curriculum vitae with work and studies.

claim: 2021年12月26日，意大利金融机构：未来两年中小企业收入将增长。
evidence: 中新网12月26日电据意大利欧联网援引欧联通讯社报道，国际金融银行(BancaIfis)研究部与意大利和欧洲市场调研研究所(FormatResearch)联合进行的最新市场调研报告指出，意大利二分之一的中小企业预计其经济状况将在2022年至2023年间普遍得到改善，收入有所增长。 据报道，研究显示，2022年至2023年，意大利有多达69%的中小企业收入估计会有所改善，由于内部需求增加，多达70%的人预计跨境销售业务会增加。
translated_claim: 26 December 2021, Italian financial institutions: SME income will increase over the next two years.
translated_evidence: The latest market research report by the Research Department of the International Finance Bank (BancaIfis), in conjunction with the Italian and European Market Research Institute (FormatResearch), noted that one in two Italian SMEs expected a general improvement in their economic situation and an increase in income between 2022 and 2023.The study reported that between 2022 and 2023, as many as 69 per cent of Italian SMEs were estimated to have improved their income, and that as many as 70 per cent of the population expected to increase cross-border sales operations as a result of increased internal demand.

claim: 2021年12月26日，95岁英女王罕见谈私生活 圣诞致辞追忆亡夫。
evidence: 中新网12月26日电综合报道，英国女王伊丽莎白二世的圣诞致辞25日播出，她在致辞中吐露丈夫去世给自己带来的痛苦，并鼓励人们克服持续的疫情带来的悲伤，与亲友共度佳节。 95岁的英女王在圣诞致辞中表示，圣诞节对许多人来说是幸福时刻，但对那些失去亲人的人而言，可能是艰难的。 她说，今年她尤其理解为什么，因为她失去了陪伴她73年的菲利普。 报道指出，英女王罕见在传统的预先录制广播中谈及私生活，流露个人感情。菲利普亲王2021年4月去世，享年99岁。
translated_claim: On December 26, 2021, the 95-year-old Queen rarely talked about his private life.
translated_evidence: In her Christmas message, the 95-year-old Queen of England said that Christmas was a time of happiness for many, but could be difficult for those who lost their loved ones. She said that this year she understood why, in particular, she lost Philip in 73 years.

claim: 普京暂定2022年唯一出国访问：参加北京冬奥开幕式。
evidence: 中国新闻网据俄罗斯卫星网26日报道，俄总统新闻秘书佩斯科夫表示，普京总统2022年目前唯一一次，也是第一次出国访问安排，是参加北京冬奥会开幕式。
translated_claim: Putin's only visit to the country, tentatively scheduled for 2022: to attend the opening of the Beijing Olympics.
translated_evidence: According to the Russian satellite network, on 26 June, the Russian Presidential Press Secretary Peskov stated that President Putin's only trip to the country in 2022, the first of its kind, was to attend the opening of the Beijing Winter Olympics.

claim: 2021年12月26日，从珠穆朗玛峰到马里亚纳海沟 塑料微粒无处不在。
evidence: 塑料微粒无处不在：陆地、海洋、大气均已发现参考消息网12月26日报道据法新社巴黎12月21日报道，周二发表的一项研究报告显示，从珠穆朗玛峰到马里亚纳海沟，塑料微粒无处不在，哪怕是在风速快到足以让塑料微粒飞行万里的地球对流层高空。 报道指出，法国国家科学研究中心的科学家们在法国比利牛斯山南比戈尔峰天文台海拔2877米的空中对空气进行了取样。
translated_claim: On December 26, 2021, from Everest to the Mariana Trench, plastic particles were everywhere.
translated_evidence: Plastic particles are everywhere: on land, at sea, and in the atmosphere, on 26 December, the Reference News Network reported that, according to Agence France Presse in Paris on 21 December, a study published on Tuesday showed that, from Everest to the Mariana Trench, plastic particles were everywhere, even if the wind was fast enough to allow plastic particles to fly over 10,000 miles of the Earth’s troposphere. According to reports, scientists from the French National Scientific Research Center sampled air at 2,877 metres above the altitude of the Monts Pegres, France.

claim: 2021年12月26日，朴槿惠获特赦150亿韩元罚款被免除 提前17年出狱。
evidence: 海外网12月26日电韩国前总统朴槿惠获得特赦，将于12月31日出狱。 可以提前17年出狱，高达150亿韩元(约合8053万元人民币)的罚款被免除。
translated_claim: On December 26, 2021, Park was granted an amnesty of 15 billion won in fine and released 17 years earlier.
translated_evidence: On December 26, South Korea’s former president Park Geun-hye was released from prison on December 31. He was released 17 years earlier, and a fine of up to 15 billion won (approximately 80.53 million yuan) was waived.

claim: 全球经济产出2022年将首破百万亿美元 专家：需防范衰退。
evidence: 中新网12月26日电据新加坡《联合早报》报道，英国智库经济和商业研究中心(CEBR)12月26日发表年度报告指出，全球经济产出将在2022年首次突破100万亿美元。 经济与商业研究中心副主席麦威廉指出，对本世纪20年代来说，重要的问题是世界经济如何应对通货膨胀。 若情况不能得到控制，那么世界将需要为2023年或2024年的经济衰退做好准备。
translated_claim: The global economic output will be the first million dollars in 2022.
translated_evidence: According to the Singapore Joint Morning Post, on 26 December, the United Kingdom’s think tank Center for Economics and Business Studies (CEPR) published its annual report on 26 December, stating that global economic output will break out for the first time by $10 trillion in 2022. William McCain, Vice-President of the Center for Economic and Business Studies, pointed out that the important question for the twentieth century was how the world economy responded to inflation.

claim: 2021年12月26日，纽约因新冠肺炎住院的儿童数量增加四倍 儿童疫苗接种率极低。
evidence: 中新网8月26日电综合报道，近期，美国儿童新增新冠病例数出现大幅上升。 根据美国儿科学会和儿童医院协会的最新报告，过去一个月中，美国的儿童病例增加了四倍多。 因为许多儿童在返回学校后不戴口罩，也无法接种疫苗。
translated_claim: On 26 December 2021, there was a fourfold increase in the number of children hospitalized in New York due to new coronary pneumonia.
translated_evidence: According to the latest report of the American Society of Paediatric Sciences and the Children’s Hospital Association, the number of children in the United States has increased more than fourfold over the past month. As many children return to school without masks, they cannot be vaccinated.

claim: 2021年12月26日，俄“苏沃洛夫大元帅”号战略核潜艇正式下水。
evidence: 俄“苏沃洛夫大元帅”号战略核潜艇正式下水当地时间25日，俄罗斯“苏沃洛夫大元帅”号战略核潜艇在北德文斯克造船厂举行下水仪式。
translated_claim: On 26 December 2021, the Russian strategic nuclear submarine “Dr. Suvolov” was officially underwater.
translated_evidence: The Russian strategic submarine “Dr. Suvolov” was officially underwater on the 25th of local time, and the Russian strategic submarine “Dr. Suvolov” was inaugurated at the North Devinsk Shipyard.

claim: 美国詹姆斯·韦布空间望远镜顺利发射入轨。
evidence: 新华社华盛顿12月25日电（记者谭晶晶）美国建造的詹姆斯·韦布空间望远镜25日从法属圭亚那库鲁航天中心发射升空并顺利入轨。 美国东部时间25日7时20分（北京时间20时20分），韦布空间望远镜由阿丽亚娜5型火箭发射升空。 在飞行27分钟后，该望远镜与火箭分离并顺利进入预定轨道。
translated_claim: The United States James Webb Space Telescope was successfully launched into orbit.
translated_evidence: The James Webb Space Telescope, built by the United States on 25 December in Washington, D.C. (Reporter Tan Jing Jing) was launched from the Kourou Space Center, French Guiana, and successfully re-orbited. On 25 December in the east of the United States, at 0720 hours (Beijing time 2020 hours), the Webb Space Telescope was launched from Ariane-5 rockets.

claim: 2021年12月25日，希腊海域非法移民船沉没事故已致16人死亡。
evidence: 新华社雅典12月25日电（记者于帅帅）希腊官方雅典-马其顿通讯社25日报道，24日晚一艘载有非法移民的船只在希腊帕罗斯岛附近爱琴海海域沉没，船上63人获救并被转移到帕罗斯岛上。 目前救援人员已找到16具遇难者遗体，搜救工作仍在进行。
translated_claim: On 25 December 2021, 16 people died as a result of the sinking of an illegal migration vessel in Greek waters.
translated_evidence: The official Athens-Macama news agency of the Xinhua Society in Athens on 25 December (journalist handsome) reported that a boat carrying illegal immigrants sank in the Aegean Sea near Palos Island, Greece, on the night of 24 December, and that 63 people on board had been rescued and transferred to Paros Island. 16 bodies of the victims had been recovered by rescue workers, and search and rescue efforts were ongoing.

claim: 2021年12月25日，俄罗斯驻乌克兰领事馆遭袭。
evidence: 据乌克兰媒体25日报道，针对俄罗斯驻乌克兰利沃夫领事馆遭袭一事，乌克兰警方已展开调查工作。 乌警方已对俄领事馆遭袭事件展开调查乌克兰国家通讯社称，乌克兰利沃夫警察局24日晚发表声明称，当地时间12月24日凌晨2点半左右，一名身份不明人员向俄罗斯驻利沃夫领事馆入口围栏方向投掷了一枚自制燃烧弹，没有人员受伤，使馆设施也未受到损伤。
translated_claim: On 25 December 2021, the Russian Consulate in Ukraine was attacked.
translated_evidence: On 25 December, the Ukrainian media reported that the Ukrainian police had opened an investigation into the attack on the Russian Consulate in Lviv, and that the Ukrainian State News Agency had opened an investigation into the attack on the Russian Consulate. According to a statement issued by the Ukrainian police station in Lviv on the evening of 24 December, an unidentified person threw a Molotov cocktail at the entrance fence of the Russian Consulate in Lviv, causing no injuries and no damage to the embassy facilities.

claim: 2021年12月25日，英国日增新冠病例首超12万例 伦敦疫情最严重。
evidence: 新华社伦敦12月24日电（记者郭爽）英国政府24日公布的新冠疫情数据显示，该国新增新冠确诊病例超过12万例，是疫情暴发以来最高纪录。 英国政府数据显示，该国24日新增确诊病例122186例，累计确诊11891292例；新增死亡137例，累计死亡147857例；截至24日的一周，该国新增约70万例确诊病例和810例死亡病例，分别比上周增加48.2%和2%。
translated_claim: On December 25, 2021, the first ever growing number of new cases in the United Kingdom was over 120,000, with the worst outbreak in London.
translated_evidence: New coronary outbreak data released by the Xinhua Society in London on 24 December (journalist Guo-hyun) and published by the British government show that more than 120,000 new confirmed cases have been added in the country, the highest since the outbreak. According to the British government, 12,2186 new confirmed cases were diagnosed on 24 December, cumulatively 1,189,292; 137 new deaths, cumulatively 147,857; and, by the week of 24, some 700,000 new confirmed cases and 810 deaths, representing an increase of 48.2 and 2 per cent, respectively, over the previous week.

claim: 意大利总理德拉吉透露：愿在2022年担任总统。
evidence: 中新网12月23日电据路透社报道，意大利总理德拉吉当地时间22日透露，他愿意在2022年初总统职位空出时担任国家元首，并称他的联合政府已经完成了大部分议程。 据报道，议会将在1月召开会议选择新总统，前欧洲央行总裁德拉吉是最看好的人选，可能接替马塔雷拉担任总统，后者已排除了再连任七年的可能性。 德拉吉发出了一个最明确的信号，即他将乐于担任这一职务，此举可能会引发议会提前选举。
translated_claim: Italian Prime Minister Draghi revealed his willingness to assume the presidency in 2022.
translated_evidence: China’s new network reported on December 23 that Italian Prime Minister Draghi’s willingness to head the state when the presidential post became vacant in early 2022, and said that his coalition government had completed most of its agenda. It was reported that Parliament would meet in January to select a new president, former European Central Bank President Draghi’s preferred candidate, possibly replacing Matarella as President, who had ruled out the possibility of a further seven-year term.

claim: 2021年12月23日，美国大学模型预测：全美未来两月或激增1.4亿确诊！。
evidence: 中新网12月23日电据美国中文网报道，奥密克戎毒株来势汹汹，新冠疫情在全美多地重新呈上升态势。 最新的一项模型预测，之后两个月情况可能还要严重得多。 据报道，华盛顿大学医学院的专家最近修正了他们的新冠疫情预测模型，以反映奥密克戎毒株的影响。 新模型显示，2022年1月1日至3月1日期间，美国可能激增1.4亿例新感染，其中最高峰将出现在1月底，每天新增280万例。
translated_claim: On December 23, 2021, the U.S. University Model predicts that the U.S. will increase by 140 million diagnostics over the next two months!
translated_evidence: A recent model predicts that the next two months may be much worse. It is reported that experts at the Washington University School of Medicine recently revised their new coronary forecast model to reflect the effects of the Omik strain.

claim: 2021年12月23日，联大主席沙希德新冠病毒检测呈阳性。
evidence: 新华社联合国12月22日电（记者尚绪谦）第76届联合国大会主席阿卜杜拉・沙希德22日说，他当天新冠病毒检测结果呈阳性。 沙希德在社交媒体上发文说，他当天新冠病毒检测结果呈阳性，目前有轻微症状，正在家中自我隔离。
translated_claim: On 23 December 2021, the President of the General Assembly tested positive for the new coronary virus.
translated_evidence: Xinhua United Nations President Abdullah Shahid, the 76th United Nations General Assembly President of Xinhua, said on December 22, the day he tested positive for the new coronary virus. Shaheed wrote in social media that he had tested positive for the new coronary virus that day, and that there were slight symptoms and self-segregation in his home.

claim: 2021年12月23日，俄罗斯卫生部注册抗新冠药物。
evidence: 中新社莫斯科12月22日电(张萌田冰)俄罗斯联邦生物医学署新闻处22日表示，俄罗斯卫生部已批准注册一种用于治疗新冠病毒的吸入型药物“MIR-19”。 俄新社援引俄联邦生物医学署新闻处的消息称，“MIR-19”由俄联邦生物医学署免疫学研究所开发，该药物的临床研究已证明其安全性和有效性，与标准疗法相比更具优势。
translated_claim: On 23 December 2021, the Russian Ministry of Health registered a drug against the new crown.
translated_evidence: On 22 December, the Press Service of the Russian Federation's Biomedical Service of the Russian Federation stated that the Russian Ministry of Health had approved the registration of an inhalable drug “MIR-19” for the treatment of the new coronary virus, citing information from the Information Service of the Russian Federation's Biomedical Service that “MIR-19” had been developed by the Institute of Immunology of the Russian Federal Biomedical Service and that clinical research on the drug had proved its safety and effectiveness and was more favourable than standard therapy.

claim: 2021年12月23日，美国食品和药品管理局批准首款新冠口服治疗药。
evidence: 中新网12月23日电据美国中文网报道，美国食品和药物管理局(FDA)22日授予辉瑞的新冠口服治疗药物紧急使用授权。 据报道，辉瑞抗病毒口服药是FDA授权的第一款专门用于对抗新冠病毒的口服抗病毒药物。
translated_claim: On 23 December 2021, the Food and Drug Administration of the United States approved a new first-aided oral treatment.
translated_evidence: On December 23, China News Network reported that on December 22, the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) of the United States gave Pfizer an emergency authorization for the use of the new coronary drug. The Pfizer antiviral drug is reported to be the first FDA-authorized oral antiviral drug dedicated to the fight against the new coronary virus.

claim: 2021年12月23日，8000万只“安倍口罩”在仓库“吃灰”，岸田：将废弃。
evidence: 中新网12月23日电综合日本共同社等报道，日本厚生劳动省22日公开了存放政府去年为应对新冠疫情花重金采购、但未能发完的布制“安倍口罩”的仓库。 首相岸田文雄21日表示，将大致在2021年度内废弃这些口罩。
translated_claim: On 23 December 2021, 80 million “Abe” masks were “eating ash” at the warehouse, ashore field: will be abandoned.
translated_evidence: On December 23, China-News and others reported that on December 22, the Ministry of Health, Labour, and Welfare of Japan made public the storage of the government’s “Abe” masks, which were purchased last year in response to the new crown disease, but which were not released. Prime Minister Kishida, on December 21, said that the masks would be abandoned in approximately 2021.

claim: 南非专家：奥密克戎变异株致病严重程度较低但传播力更强。
evidence: 当地时间22日,南非国家传染病研究所发布对于奥密克戎毒株临床症状的早期评估。 评估结果显示,与前几波疫情的主导毒株相比,奥密克戎毒株的致病严重程度较低,因感染该毒株住院的人数也相对较少。 此外,南非卫生部日前也公布了俄罗斯和南非科学家团队的研究成果,证实奥密克戎毒株在人与人之间的传播性增加。
translated_claim: Expert from South Africa: Omikium mutagenic strains that are less serious but more contagious.
translated_evidence: On the 22nd of local time, the National Institute of Infectious Diseases of South Africa released an early assessment of the clinical symptoms of the Omicium strain. The assessment showed that the Omik strain was of lower severity and relatively few hospitalizations due to the infection, compared to the dominant strain in previous waves.

claim: 2021年12月23日，联合国秘书长：联黎部队是“不稳定地区稳定的象征”。
evidence: 新华社贝鲁特12月22日电（记者刘宗亚）联合国秘书长古特雷斯日前在视察联合国驻黎巴嫩临时部队（联黎部队）总部时表示，联黎部队是“不稳定地区稳定的象征”。 古特雷斯于19日至21日访问黎巴嫩，并于21日视察了位于黎南部纳古拉镇的联黎部队总部。 他在视察中表示，联黎部队在黎巴嫩南部的作用是“不稳定地区稳定的象征”。
translated_claim: 23 December 2021, United Nations Secretary-General: UNIFIL is a “symbol of stability in unstable areas”.
translated_evidence: During his visit to the headquarters of the United Nations Interim Force in Lebanon (UNIFIL) on 22 December, the Secretary-General of the United Nations of Xinhua Society in Beirut (journalist Liu Zongya), Guterres, who had visited Lebanon from 19 to 21 December and UNIFIL headquarters in the town of Naqoura in southern Lebanon, stated that the role of UNIFIL in southern Lebanon was “a symbol of stability in unstable areas”.

claim: 2021年12月23日，巴勒斯坦总统会见美国总统国家安全事务助理。
evidence: 新华社拉姆安拉12月22日电（记者陈霖）巴勒斯坦总统阿巴斯22日晚在约旦河西岸城市拉姆安拉会见到访的美国总统国家安全事务助理沙利文，双方就巴以问题、巴美关系等进行了讨论。 据巴勒斯坦通讯社报道，阿巴斯在会见中介绍了巴勒斯坦事务的最新进展，强调以色列结束对巴勒斯坦领土的占领、停止定居点活动和定居者的敌对行为，以及尊重圣地耶路撒冷历史地位的重要性
translated_claim: On 23 December 2021, the Palestinian President met with the United States President's National Security Assistant.
translated_evidence: On the evening of 22 December, President Sullivan, Assistant to the President of the United States for National Security Affairs, met by Xinhua Society Ram Allah (journalist Chen), Palestinian President Abbas, in the West Bank city of Ram Allah, discussed Palestinian-Israeli issues, Palestinian-American relations, etc. In his meeting, the Palestinian News Agency reported that Abbas had provided an update on developments in Palestinian affairs, stressing the importance of ending the Israeli occupation of Palestinian territory, ending settlement activities and the hostility of settlers, and respecting the historic status of the Holy City of Jerusalem.

claim: 2021年12月23日，抗疫失灵暴露“美式人权”虚伪面目。
evidence: 近日，华中科技大学人权法律研究院发布《美式“抗疫”的人权灾难》报告指出，面对新冠肺炎疫情肆虐，美国政府未能将本国人民的生命健康权置于最重要位置，放弃了对弱势群体的平等保障和特殊保护，成为抗疫国际合作的绊脚石，造成严重人道主义灾难。 美式“抗疫”的失灵，再次凸显这个自诩“民主灯塔”“人权卫士”国家的痼疾，“美式人权”的虚伪性暴露无遗。
translated_claim: On 23 December 2021, an epidemic failure exposed the false face of “American-style human rights”.
translated_evidence: A recent report by the Human Rights Law Institute of the Chinese University of Science and Technology, entitled “The American Human Rights Catastrophe against the Epidemic,” states that, in the face of the outbreak of neo-crowd pneumonia, the United States Government has failed to place the highest priority on the right to life and health of its people, abandoning equal guarantees and special protection for vulnerable groups and becoming a stumbling block in international cooperation to combat the epidemic, causing a serious humanitarian disaster. The failure of the American “epidemic” has once again highlighted the ill health of the “human rights champion” nation, a self-proclaimed “democracy beacon.”

claim: 2021年12月23日，马达加斯加沉船事故死亡人数升至83人。
evidence: 新华社塔那那利佛12月22日电（记者文浩）马达加斯加港务部门22日说，截至当晚，马东北部海域20日发生的沉船事故死亡人数升至83人，有50人获救，仍有5人下落不明。
translated_claim: On 23 December 2021, the number of deaths from shipwrecks in Madagascar rose to 83.
translated_evidence: On 22 December, the Malagasy port service in Antananarivo, Xinhua, reported that, as of that same night, the number of casualties from the shipwreck that occurred in the north-eastern sea of Ma had risen to 83, 50 had been rescued and 5 were still unaccounted for.

claim: 2021年12月23日，新技术让3D打印生物组织更方便存储。
evidence: 新华社塔那那利佛12月22日电（记者文浩）马达加斯加港务部门22日说，截至当晚，马东北部海域20日发生的沉船事故死亡人数升至83人，有50人获救，仍有5人下落不明。 使用3D生物打印技术制造人造人体组织的做法最早出现在20年前。与传统3D打印一样，墨水通过一个喷嘴被逐层挤压成预先指定的形状。在生物打印中，墨水通常由嵌入活细胞的明胶状支架组成。 冷冻生物打印的工作原理与此相同，不同之处在于，打印是直接在温度低至零下20℃的冷板上进行。 在组织被打印出来后，它们立即被移到低温条件下进行长期储存。
translated_claim: On 23 December 2021, new technologies made it easier to store 3D print biological tissues.
translated_evidence: The use of 3D bioprinting techniques to create man-made tissues began 20 years ago. Like traditional 3D printings, ink is squeezed from a nozzle to a layer to a predefined shape. In bioprinting, ink is usually composed of visible glue staircases embedded in living cells.

claim: 2021年12月23日，缅甸工业部与国药集团中国生物签署新冠疫苗半成品供应协议。
evidence: 新华社仰光12月22日电（记者张东强车宏亮）缅甸工业部与国药集团中国生物22日在缅甸仰光签署新冠疫苗半成品供应协议。 中国驻缅甸大使陈海、缅甸工业部长查理丹在现场，缅甸驻华大使苗丹佩和国药集团董事长刘敬桢以视频连线的方式，共同见证中缅双方代表以线上线下相结合方式签署了协议。
translated_claim: On 23 December 2021, the Ministry of Industry of Myanmar signed an agreement with Chinese biology of the National Pharmaceutical Group for the supply of the semi-finished vaccine.
translated_evidence: Xinhua Society, Yangon, December 22, Myanmar Ministry of Industry signed an agreement with Chinese Life Group 22 in Yangon, Myanmar, for the supply of the new crown vaccine. The Chinese Ambassador to Myanmar, Chen Hai, and Myanmar Minister of Industry, Charlie Dan, were present.

claim: 2021年12月23日，美国第三季度经济增速修正终值为2.3%。
evidence: 新华社华盛顿12月22日电（记者许缘高攀）美国商务部22日公布的最终修正数据显示，今年第三季度美国实际国内生产总值按年率计算增长2.3%，较此前公布的修正数据上调0.2个百分点。
translated_claim: On 23 December 2021, the end-point of the United States economic acceleration in the third quarter was 2.3 per cent.
translated_evidence: The final revised data published by the United States Department of Commerce in Washington, D.C., on 22 December, showed that real GDP in the United States grew by 2.3 per cent at annual rates in the third quarter of this year, an increase of 0.2 percentage points over the previously published revised data.

claim: 2021年12月22日，2021中缅媒体双城论坛在昆明举行。
evidence: 12月22日，“2021中缅媒体双城论坛”在中国昆明举行。 中缅两国相关政府官员、媒体人、学者、智库专家、翻译工作者以“建立互信强化互动——中缅媒体合作走向未来”为主题，展开主旨发言和讨论。 中国云南省宣传部部长曾艳、缅甸宣传部部长吴貌貌翁、缅甸驻中国大使吴苗丹佩等中缅两国相关领导人也应邀出席论坛。
translated_claim: On 22 December 2021, the China-Myanmar Bi-City Forum for Media was held in Kunming.
translated_evidence: Keynote addresses and discussions were held in Kunming, China, on 22 December, under the theme “Building mutual trust and strengthening interaction – cooperation between the media in China and Myanmar” by relevant Chinese government officials, media, academics, think tank experts, and translators. The Chinese Minister of Communications in Yunnan Province was also invited to participate in the forum, including China’s former Minister of Communications, Myanmar’s Minister of Communications, Wu Maung Maung-un, and Myanmar’s Ambassador to China, U Myung Tan Pei.

claim: 2021年12月22日，韩前总统朴槿惠胞妹宣布参选下届总统。
evidence: 中新社首尔12月22日电(记者刘旭)当地时间21日，韩国前总统朴槿惠胞妹、前育英财团理事长朴槿姈宣布，她将以新韩半岛党籍候选人身份参加于明年3月举行的第20届韩国总统大选。
translated_claim: On 22 December 2021, former President Park Seok-hye-sis announced his candidacy for the next President.
translated_evidence: On 22 December, in Seoul, China News Agency (journalist Liu Xu), local time, 21 December, the former President of the Republic of Korea, Park Eun-hye, and former President of the Yu Ying Foundation, Park Yong-yun, announced that she would participate in the twentieth Korean presidential election in March next year as a candidate for the New Korea Peninsula Party.

claim: 2021年12月22日，詹姆斯·韦伯太空望远镜因恶劣天气推迟发射。
evidence: 中新社旧金山12月21日电美国国家航空航天局(NASA)当地时间21日称，受法属圭亚那库鲁航天中心所在区域的恶劣天气影响，詹姆斯·韦伯太空望远镜的发射日期将从12月24日推迟至最早12月25日。 詹姆斯·韦伯太空望远镜原定于美东时间24日7时20分从法属圭亚那库鲁航天中心发射升空。
translated_claim: On 22 December 2021, the launch of the James Weber Space Telescope was delayed due to bad weather.
translated_evidence: China News Agency San Francisco, 21 December, local NASA time, stated that the launch date of the James Weber Space Telescope would be postponed from 24 December to 25 December, as early as possible, due to adverse weather conditions in the region of the Kourou Space Centre in French Guiana, and that the James Weber Space Telescope had been scheduled to be launched from the Kourou Space Centre in French Guiana at 0720 hours on 24 December.

claim: 2021年12月22日，菲社会福利与发展部：中国政府援菲大米是在菲最需要的时候送来的珍贵礼物。
evidence: 菲社会福利与发展部：中国政府援菲大米是在菲最需要的时候送来的珍贵礼物中新社马尼拉12月22日电(记者关向东)菲律宾社会福利与发展部22日在马尼拉举行中国政府援菲1万吨大米交接仪式，中国驻菲大使黄溪连和菲社会福利与发展部代表普里瓦多、总统中国事务特使洪海萍出席。 普里瓦多代表在灾区救灾的菲社会福利与发展部部长包蒂斯塔，对中方的及时慷慨援助致以衷心感谢，表示中国援助的大米是在菲最需要的时候送来的珍贵礼物，为菲政府的救灾工作提供了及时有力的支持。
translated_claim: 22 December 2021, FSWD: The Chinese Government's assistance to FHI was a precious gift from Fifi at a time when he needed it most.
translated_evidence: PfD: The Chinese government’s assistance to Fifi is a precious gift from the Chinese government at a time when Ffie needs it most. The Chinese government’s assistance to Fifi was delivered in Manila on December 22, with the Ministry of Social Welfare and Development of the Philippines at a ceremony in Manila on December 22, where the Chinese government’s assistance to Fif 10,000 tons of rice was delivered on behalf of Ambassador Huang Qun and the Ministry of Social Welfare and Development of China, in the presence of Privado, the President’s Special Envoy for China’s affairs, Hong Haiping.

claim: 2021年12月22日，马来西亚洪灾已致27人死 总理称未来将改进救灾。
evidence: 中新网12月22日电据法新社报道，受季风影响，马来西亚近日持续降雨，多地发生洪灾。 当地时间22日，洪灾已致27人死亡。 马来西亚总理伊斯迈尔·沙必里承认此次救灾存在“弱点”，承诺未来会有所改善。
translated_claim: On 22 December 2021, 27 people died as a result of flooding in Malaysia, and the Prime Minister stated that relief would be improved in the future.
translated_evidence: On December 22, China-News and China-News reported that Malaysia has been hit by continuous monsoon rains and flooding, which killed 27 people on 22 local time. Malaysian Prime Minister Ismail Shapiri, acknowledging the “weakness” of the relief, promised that there would be improvements in the future.

claim: 2021年12月22日，欧洲天然气价飙升600% 天气转冷能源短缺问题料加剧。
evidence: 中新网12月22日电据外媒22日报道，2021年以来，能源价格失控，欧洲天然气价格飙升了约600%。 随着天气转冷，加上能源供应原本就跟不上需求，预计欧洲本周能源短缺问题将加剧。
translated_claim: On 22 December 2021, European gas prices surged by 600 per cent, and weather-cooled energy shortages increased.
translated_evidence: China-News Network reported on December 22, that, since 2021, energy prices have been out of control, and European gas prices have skyrocketed by about 600%. As the weather cools, and energy supplies have not kept pace with demand, Europe’s energy shortage is expected to increase this week.

claim: 希腊总理提防疫“两阶段计划” 第五波疫情将最猛烈。
evidence: 塞萨洛尼基亚里斯多德大学环境工程学教授萨利亚尼斯接受采访，谈到疫情的发展状况时表示，由于奥密克戎毒株存在，第五波疫情将成为希腊遭遇的最猛烈一波。 米佐塔基斯还在会议上提出了近期疫情防控工作的“两阶段计划”。 第一阶段是让民众参加庆祝活动的前后进行测试，以了解自己是否被感染。 第二阶段的防控工作将在假期后开始，这将取决于希腊疫情的具体发展。
translated_claim: The fifth wave of the Greek Prime Minister's two-phase plan will be the most violent.
translated_evidence: In an interview with Salanis, Professor of Environmental Engineering, Aristotle University, Thessaloniki, referring to the development of the epidemic, he said that the fifth outbreak would be one of the most severe in Greece because of the existence of the Omik drug strain. Mizotakis also presented a “two-phase plan” for the recent outbreak prevention and control at the conference.

claim: 奥密克戎毒株或将给国际油价带来新不确定性。
evidence: 新华社纽约12月21日电（记者刘亚南）受市场风险偏好变化影响，国际原油期货价格21日显著上涨，但不少市场分析人士表示，变异新冠病毒奥密克戎毒株在多国迅速传播，或将给未来油价走势带来更多不确定因素。 截至当天收盘时，纽约商品交易所2022年2月交货的轻质原油期货价格上涨2.51美元，收于每桶71.12美元，涨幅为3.66%；2022年2月交货的伦敦布伦特原油期货价格则上涨了2.46美元，收于每桶73.98美元，涨幅为3.44%。
translated_claim: Omik’s poison strain may bring new uncertainty to international oil prices.
translated_evidence: While the price of international crude oil futures rose significantly on 21 December, as a result of a change in market risk in New York, Xinhua City electricity (journalist Liu Yanan), many market analysts indicated that the transformation of the new coronal virus Omicone strain was spreading rapidly in many countries or would create further uncertainty about future oil price movements. At the time of the harvest, the price of light crude oil futures delivered by the New York Commodity Exchange in February 2022 had increased by $2.51 to $71.1 per barrel, an increase of 3.66 per cent; and the price of London Brent crude futures delivered in February 2022, an increase of $2.46 per barrel, or 3.44 per cent.

claim: 英国首相：2021年圣诞节前不采取进一步新冠防控措施。
evidence: 12月21日，英国首相约翰逊在伦敦发表讲话。 新华社发（英国首相府供图）新华社伦敦12月21日电（记者郭爽）英国首相约翰逊21日宣布，政府不会在圣诞节前实施任何进一步的新冠防控措施。
translated_claim: British Prime Minister: No further new coronary controls by Christmas 2021.
translated_evidence: On 21 December, British Prime Minister Johnson made a speech in London, and Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua News (the British Prime Minister's Office's supply chart) announced on 21 December that British Prime Minister Johnson would not implement any further new coronary controls before Christmas.

claim: 2021年12月22日，为遏制奥密克戎传播 德国圣诞后将大幅限制人际接触。
evidence: 为遏制奥密克戎传播德国圣诞后将大幅限制人际接触（抗击新冠肺炎）为遏制奥密克戎传播德国圣诞后将大幅限制人际接触中新社柏林12月22日电（记者彭大伟）德国联邦政府21日与各州举行会议后达成决议，为遏制新冠奥密克戎毒株传播，将于圣诞节后的12月28日开始在全国范围内大幅限制私人聚会和大型活动期间的人际接触。 其中，私人聚会最多不能超过10人，大型活动则仅允许无观众举行。
translated_claim: On December 22, 2021, in order to curb the spread of Omicron, Germany will significantly limit interpersonal contact after Christmas.
translated_evidence: In order to curb the spread of Omikian Christmas in Germany, which will significantly restrict interpersonal contact (combating neo-crowd pneumonia) and the spread of Omikian in Germany after Christmas, the German federal government, following a meeting with the Länder on December 22, Berlin (journalist Peng Da Wei), reached a resolution that will, on December 28, after Christmas, significantly restrict personal contacts throughout the country during private gatherings and major events. Of these, private gatherings must not exceed 10 people, while large events are allowed to take place only without viewers.

claim: 2021年12月22日，德国柏林选出二战后首位女性市长。
evidence: 中新社柏林12月21日电(记者彭大伟)弗兰齐丝卡·吉费(FranziskaGiffey)21日正式当选德国首都柏林新一任市长，并于当天率新一届政府就职。 吉费是二战结束后柏林由选举产生的首位女性市长，同时也是两德统一后首位出身原东德的柏林市长。
translated_claim: On 22 December 2021, Berlin, Germany, elected its first female mayor after World War II.
translated_evidence: On 21 December, KCN Berlin (journalist Peng Da Wei) Franziska Giffey was officially elected as the new mayor of Berlin, Germany’s capital, and took office the same day in a new government. Jiffe was the first female mayor to be elected in Berlin after World War II, and the first to be from the former East Germany after the reunification of the two Germanys.

claim: “蛀虫”猖獗！美国近1000亿美元新冠纾困金被骗领。
evidence: 中新网12月22日电据美国中文网报道，美国特勤局当地时间21日表示，犯罪分子在新冠疫情期间“窃取”了近1000亿美元的联邦纾困资金。 中新网12月22日电据美国中文网报道，美国特勤局当地时间21日表示，犯罪分子在新冠疫情期间“窃取”了近1000亿美元的联邦纾困资金。
translated_claim: The Worm is rampant. Nearly $100 billion in new United States crown relief money is being tricked.
translated_evidence: On December 22, China News Network reported that US Secret Service local time 21 said that criminals “stealed” nearly $100 billion in federal bailout funds during the new crown epidemic. On December 22, China News Network reported that US Secret Service local time 21 said that criminals “stealed” nearly $100 billion in federal bailout funds during the new crown epidemic.

claim: 2021年12月22日，哈萨克斯坦卫生部长卸任 防疫工作获总统肯定。
evidence: 哈通社/努尔苏丹/12月20日—根据总统哈斯穆-卓玛尔特·托卡耶夫签署的法令，阿列克谢·崔将不再担任哈萨克斯坦卫生部部长职务。 据总统新闻秘书别热克•瓦里官方Facebook消息，托卡耶夫总统感谢阿列克谢·崔的积极工作，特别是在防止新冠病毒在哈传播方面做出的贡献。
translated_claim: On 22 December 2021, the President confirmed the departure of the Minister of Health of Kazakhstan.
translated_evidence: HATT/NURSudan/Dec.20 – In accordance with the decree signed by President Hasmu-Thomart Tokayev, Alekse Cui will no longer hold the post of Minister of Health of Kazakhstan. According to official Facebook news secretary Bezhek Wali, President Tokaev thanks Alexei Choi for his active work, particularly in preventing the spread of the new crown virus.

claim: 2021年12月22日，日首相岸田罕见出席修宪会议 称将全力实现修宪。
evidence: 中新网12月22日电据日本共同社报道，21日，日本首相岸田文雄出席了在自民党总部召开的“自民党修宪实现本部”会议，并在会上宣称将集全党之力实现修宪。 据报道，岸田在会上还表示，“希望(你们)做出成绩，让(修宪)实现本部大踏步前进”。
translated_claim: On 22 December 2021, Prime Minister Akita was rarely present at the Constitutional Amendment Conference and stated that he would make every effort to achieve the constitutional amendment.
translated_evidence: On 22 December, China-USN reported that, on 21 December, Japanese Prime Minister Kishida Kishida attended a conference at the headquarters of the SLDP on “The Realization of the Constitution of the SLDP” at which he announced that he would bring the whole party together to bring about a constitutional amendment.

claim: 0.1%！美国人口2021年增长率创新低 疫情影响明显。
evidence: 美国人口增长率创新低来源：中国新闻网中新网12月22日电据美国中文网报道，当地时间21日，美国人口普查局公布的数据显示，疫情期间，美国的人口增长率创下了该国建国以来的最低纪录。 据报道，从2020年7月到2021年7月的一年中，美国人口增长了392665人，增长率仅为0.1%，创历史新低。
translated_claim: 0.1%! America's population grew at a low rate of innovation in 2021, and the impact of the epidemic is clear.
translated_evidence: The US population growth rate is at its lowest level since the country’s inception during the epidemic. In the year between July 2020 and July 2021, the US is reported to have grown by 39,2665 people, a growth rate of just 0.1%, a record low.

claim: 2021年12月22日，普京分别与法德领导人通电话讨论俄安全保障等问题。
evidence: 新华社莫斯科12月21日电（记者李奥）俄罗斯总统普京21日分别与法国总统马克龙、德国总理朔尔茨通电话，就俄方提交的俄美安全保障条约草案、俄与北约成员国安全保障措施协议等进行了讨论。 据克里姆林宫网站消息，普京当天分别与法德领导人通电话，重点就俄美安全保障条约草案、俄与北约成员国安全保障措施协议等进行了讨论。 普京阐述了俄方要求在法律上提供长期安全保障的建议，以排除北约进一步东扩和在俄邻国部署进攻性武器系统的可能。
translated_claim: On 22 December 2021, Putin made separate telephone calls with the leaders of the French-German leadership to discuss issues such as Russian security and safety.
translated_evidence: According to the Kremlin website, Putin spoke on the same day with the leaders of France, focusing on the draft Russian-American safeguards treaty, the agreement on security measures between Russia and NATO member states, and so on. Putin elaborated on Russia’s proposal to legally provide long-term security guarantees to exclude the possibility of further expansion of NATO to the east and deployment of offensive weapons systems in neighboring countries.

claim: 2021年12月22日，英国在两难选择中加息。
evidence: 12月16日，英格兰银行议息会议宣布将基准利率从0.1%提升至0.25%，成为自新冠肺炎疫情暴发以来首个加息的主要经济体央行。 此前11月在议息会议时英格兰银行曾表示，来自能源、劳动力市场收紧等价格上涨的压力是暂时的，可能会在未来几个月内过去。 但新一轮疫情的暴发和全球供应链的持续“破碎”使得英国的通胀压力加剧，英格兰银行行长贝利在议息会议结束后接受媒体采访时表示，英格兰银行已经看到了劳动力市场十分紧张的证据，看到了更持久的通胀压力，这是加息的主要原因。 英国货币政策突然转向让市场感到惊讶，延长宽松期巩固经济复苏还是尽早应对通胀对英格兰银行来说是个“两难问题”。
translated_claim: On 22 December 2021, the United Kingdom raised interest among the dilemmas.
translated_evidence: On 16 December, the Bank of England announced an increase in benchmark interest rates from 0.1% to 0.25%, the first major economic central bank to raise interest rates since the outbreak of the neo-crowd pneumonia outbreak. Earlier in November, at that meeting, the Bank of England had stated that pressure from rising prices, such as energy and labour-market tightening, was temporary and might be over in the coming months.

claim: 2021年12月22日，中方对巴勒斯坦被占领土的安全局势表示担忧。
evidence: 新华社联合国12月21日电中国常驻联合国副代表戴兵21日在联合国安理会中东巴勒斯坦问题公开会上发言，对巴勒斯坦被占领土的安全局势表示担忧。
translated_claim: On 22 December 2021, China expressed concern about the security situation in the Occupied Palestinian Territory.
translated_evidence: The Xinhua Society addressed the United Nations Security Council meeting on 21 December on the question of Palestine in the Middle East at the 21st meeting of the Deputy Permanent Representative of China to the United Nations, and expressed concern about the security situation in the occupied Palestinian territories.

claim: 2021年12月22日，拜登称美国疫情形势不会回到2020年的严峻程度。
evidence: 当地时间12月21日，美国总统拜登就新冠肺炎疫情发表全国讲话，称美国疫情形势不会回到2020年的严峻程度。 拜登表示，超2亿美国人已经接种了新冠疫苗，对新冠病毒的认识更加深刻准确，医疗物资供应也不再是难题，因此美国绝不会重蹈2020年3月的覆辙。
translated_claim: On 22 December 2021, Biden stated that the situation in the United States would not return to the critical level of 2020.
translated_evidence: On December 21, local time, US President Biden delivered a national speech on the new coronary pneumonia epidemic, saying that the US epidemic would not return to the critical level of 2020. Biden said that more than 200 million Americans had been vaccinated against the new coronary, that awareness of the new coronary virus was much more accurate, and that medical supplies were no longer a challenge, so that the US would never go back to what it did in March 2020.

claim: 科技支撑全球通往碳中和之路。
evidence: 今日视点    2020年9月22日，习近平主席在第七十五届联合国大会一般性辩论上向国际社会作出碳达峰、碳中和的郑重承诺，中国将力争2030年前达到二氧化碳排放峰值，努力争取2060年前实现碳中和。 抓住新一轮科技革命和产业变革的历史性机遇，推动疫情后世界经济“绿色复苏”，汇聚起可持续发展的强大合力，已在中国社会形成广泛共识。 通往全球碳中和之路离不开更密切的国际科技合作。
translated_claim: Science and technology underpin the global path to carbon neutrality.
translated_evidence: On September 22, 2020, President Xi Jinping made a solemn commitment to the international community at the general debate of the United Nations General Assembly at its seventy-fifth session to reach carbon peaks, carbon neutrality, by 2030, and China will strive to achieve carbon neutrality by 2050. Seizing the historic opportunity of a new science and technology revolution and industrial transformation to push for a “green recovery” of the world economy in the wake of the epidemic, bringing together strong synergies for sustainable development, has led to a broad consensus in Chinese society.

claim: 普京称北约东扩是西方冷战后“精神亢奋”的结果。
evidence: 中新社莫斯科12月21日电(张萌田冰)俄罗斯总统普京21日在俄国防部部委会扩大会议上发表讲话时表示，北约东扩是西方国家自冷战结束以来的“精神亢奋”，以及他们对局势的错误分析。 他认为，导致局势恶化的责任在于美国，美国退出有关战略稳定等的各种协议，并持续扩大北约。 他表示，这是由于西方国家在冷战结束后“精神亢奋”，对当时局势和未来发展作出了错误的评估分析。
translated_claim: Putin described the expansion of NATO to the east as the result of a post-cold war Western “spiritual triumph”.
translated_evidence: In his speech at the expanded meeting of the Ministry of Defence of Russia’s Ministry of Defence on 21 December, the Russian President of the Central News Agency, Vladimir Putin, stated that NATO’s expansion to the east had been “spiritual” by Western countries since the end of the cold war, and that they misanalysed the situation. In his view, the responsibility for the deterioration of the situation lay with the US, which withdrew from various agreements on strategic stability, and continued to expand NATO.

claim: 2021年12月22日，日美就增加分摊驻日美军费用达成一致。
evidence: 新华社东京12月21日电（记者郭丹）据共同社21日报道，日本与美国当天就未来5年驻日美军经费分摊问题达成一致。 双方决定，2022至2026财年，日本需承担的驻日美军经费为1.0551万亿日元（约合92.78亿美元），较2016至2020财年增加750亿日元（约合6.6亿美元）。
translated_claim: On 22 December 2021, Japan and the United States agreed to increase their share of United States military costs in Japan.
translated_evidence: Xinhua Society Tokyo, 21 December (journalist Kwok Dan) reported that Japan and the US agreed on the same day to share the US military’s contribution over the next five years. The two sides decided that Japan’s share of US military spending in Japan would be 1.0551 trillion yen (approximately $9.278 billion) for fiscal years 2022 to 2026, an increase of 75 billion yen (approximately $660 million) over the 2016 to 2020 fiscal year.

claim: 2021年12月21日，泰国宣布暂停受理“免隔离”入境申请。
evidence: 新华社发（拉亨摄）新华社曼谷12月21日电（任芊宋宇）泰国总理府21日发布通告说，变异新冠病毒奥密克戎毒株在泰国已呈快速传播之势，泰国政府决定自22日起暂停受理境外旅客“免隔离”入境和“沙盒”计划申请，但“普吉岛旅游沙盒计划”除外。
translated_claim: On 21 December 2021, Thailand suspended its application for “exclusion from segregation”.
translated_evidence: Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua (Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua Xinhua

claim: 俄外交部副部长称如果西方不回应俄方建议 俄将考虑在白俄罗斯部署核武器。
evidence: 军事专家维克多·巴兰采夫指出，美国试图尽可能地回避向俄罗斯提供安全保障的承诺，因为它并不只打算在德国部署核武器，还打算在波兰部署核武器。 在他看来，如果华盛顿不放弃这件事情，莫斯科就会认为这是在为对俄发动核战争做准备，在这样的情况下，俄罗斯的核导弹可能会出现在白俄罗斯。
translated_claim: The Deputy Minister for Foreign Affairs of Russia said that if the West did not respond to the Russian proposal, Russia would consider deploying nuclear weapons in Belarus.
translated_evidence: Military expert Victor Barentsev has stated that the US is trying to avoid, to the extent possible, its commitment to providing security assurances to Russia, as it does not intend only to deploy nuclear weapons in Germany, but also in Poland. In his view, if Washington did not abandon this, Moscow would think that it was preparing for a nuclear war against Russia, in which case Russia’s nuclear missiles might appear in Belarus.

claim: 2021年12月21日，东电正式提交福岛核污水排海计划申请 韩国重申担忧。
evidence: 中新网12月21日电据韩媒报道，韩国政府21日就东京电力向日本监管部门申请审查福岛第一核电站核污水排海一事，紧急召开相关部门次官(副部级)会议，并对日本此举表示忧虑。 韩国政府表示，日方一直没有充分提供福岛核电站污水排海信息，因此政府已于昨日向日方递交质疑书，要求日方就此进行详细解释。
translated_claim: On December 21st, 2021, Tokushima officially submitted an application for a Fukushima nuclear sewerage scheme, and the Republic of Korea reiterated its concern.
translated_evidence: According to the Korean media, on 21 December, the Korean government urgently convened a meeting of the relevant departmental under-secretaries (Deputy Ministers) on 21 December in connection with a request from the Japanese regulatory authority for Tokyo power to review the nuclear sewage drain at the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear power plant, and expressed concern about Japan’s move. The Korean government stated that it had not provided sufficient information about the sewage drain at the Fukushima nuclear power station, and it therefore submitted a petition to the Japanese side yesterday, requesting detailed explanation from the Japanese side.

claim: 2021年12月21日，泰国宣布暂停免隔离入境 以应对奥密克戎毒株威胁。
evidence: 中新网12月21日电据新加坡《联合早报》报道，新冠变种毒株奥密克戎传播迅速使全球拉响了警报 泰国政府12月21日宣布，从即日起暂时取消免隔离入境，对外国旅客恢复强制隔离。据报道，泰国政府发言人说，泰国将暂停让完成疫苗接种的外国旅客豁免隔离的计划，而恢复此前在酒店隔离的安排，隔离时长介于7天至10天。
translated_claim: On December 21, 2021, Thailand announced a moratorium on incommunicado entry in response to the threat posed by the Omik Treasure.
translated_evidence: According to the Singapore Joint Morning Post on December 21, the spread of the new capping drug strain, Omikium, quickly raised the alarm worldwide, and the Thai government announced on December 21 that it would suspend the exemption from isolation and restore compulsory isolation of foreign passengers from that date. According to the Thai government spokesman, Thailand will suspend its plans to exempt foreign travellers who have completed vaccinations from isolation, while restoring previous arrangements for isolation in hotels, which ranged from 7 to 10 days.

claim: 2021年12月21日，朴槿惠胞妹宣布参选下届总统 称韩政界汲汲于争权夺位。
evidence: 中新网12月21日电据韩媒报道，韩国前总统朴槿惠胞妹、前育英财团理事长朴槿姈于21日在首尔新闻中心召开记者会，宣布参加第20届总统选举。 据报道，朴槿姈表示，现在政界和总统候选人不关心团结全民的治本之策等，汲汲于争权夺位。
translated_claim: On December 21st, 2021, the sister-in-law Park announced her candidacy for the next president of the Republic of Korea, claiming that the country's politics had won power.
translated_evidence: According to the Korean media, on 21 December, the former President of the Republic of Korea, Park Eun-hye, and former President of the Yu Ying Foundation, Park Hao, organized a press conference at the information centre in Seoul to announce their participation in the 20th presidential election. According to reports, the current political and presidential candidates do not care about the solution of the root causes of a united nation, among other things, and compete for power.

claim: 不良品率15%、检查费高……“安倍口罩”引日网友不满。
evidence: 中新网12月21日电综合日媒报道，针对日本前首相安倍晋三执政期间，作为新冠对策发放的“安倍口罩”，目前仍有大量库存问题，21日，日本首相岸田文雄表示，在产品检查过程中发现，有15%的口罩为不良品。 此外，检查口罩的质量等所用费用或超过20亿日元(约合人民币1亿元)。
translated_claim: Bad quality rate of 15%, high inspection fees...The Abe mask is a daily user of discontent.
translated_evidence: On 21 December, China-News Network reported that the “Aben masks” issued as a response to the new crown during Japan’s former Prime Minister Shinzo Abe’s term in office still have a large stocking problem, and on 21 December, Japanese Prime Minister Kiyoto Akida stated that 15% of the masks were found to be bad during product inspections. In addition, the cost of checking the quality of the masks was more than 2 billion yen (approximately 100 million yuan).

claim: 2021年12月21日，中国驻菲律宾大使黄溪连称中方紧急救灾物资正运往台风“雷伊”灾民手中。
evidence: 中新网马尼拉12月21日电(记者关向东)中国驻菲律宾大使黄溪连21日通过社交媒体声明，中方紧急救灾物资正运往超强台风“雷伊”受灾地区灾民手中。
translated_claim: On 21 December 2021, the Chinese Ambassador to the Philippines, Wong Creek, stated that Chinese emergency relief supplies were being delivered to the victims of Typhoon Rai.
translated_evidence: On 21 December, the Chinese Ambassador to the Philippines, Wong Creek Company, adopted a social media statement in Manila, China, where emergency relief supplies were being delivered to disaster victims in the disaster-affected areas of Typhoon Rai.

claim: 2021年12月21日，中国驻南非大使视频会见南非卫生部长。
evidence: 12月20日，陈晓东大使视频会见南非卫生部长法赫拉。 陈大使积极评价中南关系和两国团结抗疫成果，赞赏法赫拉履新以来在推进南非新冠疫苗接种、应对奥密克戎毒株及第四波疫情方面发挥的积极作用。
translated_claim: On 21 December 2021, the Chinese Ambassador to South Africa held a video interview with the Minister of Health of South Africa.
translated_evidence: On 20 December, Ambassador Chen Xiaodong held a video interview with the Minister of Health of South Africa, Fakhla, who gave a positive assessment of the south-south relationship and the results of the two countries'solidarity against the epidemic, and appreciated the positive role that Fakhla has played in advancing the new crown vaccination in South Africa, the fight against the Omikium strain and the fourth wave of the epidemic.

claim: 2021年12月21日，日本对3名死囚执行死刑 为现任首相岸田内阁下首次。
evidence: 中新网12月21日电综合日媒报道，由于杀人案件而被判死刑的3名日本囚犯，于21日上午执行了死刑。 这是继2019年12月以来的2年间，日本首次执行死刑，也是日本首相岸田文雄上台后，首次执行死刑。
translated_claim: On 21 December 2021, Japan carried out the death penalty on three death row prisoners for the first time for the current Prime Minister, His Excellency Mr. Ashida.
translated_evidence: On 21 December, China-USN reported that three Japanese prisoners sentenced to death for murder had been executed in the morning of 21 December, the first execution in Japan since December 2019, and the first execution in Japan since Prime Minister Yoshida took office.

claim: 2021年12月21日，美疾控中心：奥密克戎已成为在美传播主导毒株。
evidence: 21/12/2021-14:01圣诞和新年临近，变异新冠病毒株奥密克戎也正快速席卷而来，最新的发展是该毒株已占到美国新增感染的73%，超越德尔塔成为在美主要流行的变异株。
translated_claim: On 21 December 2021, the American Center for Disease Control: Omikrum has become the dominant toxic strain in the United States.
translated_evidence: 21/12/2011-14:01 Christmas and New Year are approaching, and the transformation of the new coronary strain of Omikium, which has recently accounted for 73 per cent of new infections in the United States, has become the dominant mutant in the United States beyond Delta.

claim: 奥密克戎毒株或致美国两款新冠药物有效性下降。
evidence: 新华社华盛顿12月20日电（记者谭晶晶）据美国再生元制药公司和礼来公司的最新表态，变异新冠病毒奥密克戎毒株可能使两款新冠药物疗法有效性下降。
translated_claim: Omikium strains or two new crown drugs in the United States have declined in effectiveness.
translated_evidence: Xinhua News Agency, Washington, D.C., 20 December (Reporter Tan Jing Jing), according to the latest statements of the United States regenerative dollar pharmaceutical company and Relai, the transformation of the Omicone strain of the new coronary virus could reduce the effectiveness of the two new coronary drug treatments.

claim: 2021年12月21日，白俄罗斯驻英国大使馆遭袭 一名外交官受重伤。
evidence: 中国新闻网中新网12月21日电据俄罗斯卫星网报道，当地时间20日，白俄罗斯外交部发布消息称，白俄罗斯驻英国大使馆在19日晚遭到袭击，1名外交官重伤。 据报道，白俄罗斯外交部在消息中指出，一群人先是破坏了位于伦敦的白俄罗斯大使馆外墙，在白方外交官赶到现场后，这伙人又对外交人员展开人身攻击。 报道称，白方1名外交官被打成重伤，他随后接受了紧急救治。
translated_claim: On 21 December 2021, a diplomat was seriously injured in an attack on the Embassy of Belarus in the United Kingdom.
translated_evidence: On 21 December, according to a Russian satellite network report, on 20 local time, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Belarus reported that the Belarusian Embassy in the United Kingdom had been attacked on the night of 19 and that a diplomat had been seriously injured. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Belarus reported that a group of people had first destroyed the outer wall of the Belarusian Embassy in London, and that they had attacked diplomats once they arrived.

claim: 2022年起，驻日美军“保护费”涨了，日方平均每年多付100亿日元。
evidence: 中新网12月21日电综合日媒报道，日美两国政府围绕2022年度起，5年的驻日美军驻留经费的日方负担金额，就总额定为约1.055万亿日元(约合人民币592亿元)达成了共识。 每年度平均约为2110亿日元(约合人民币118亿元)，超过了现行水平。 报道称，2022年度起5年的驻日美军经费，日方负担的平均每年度的费用，比2021年度增加了约100亿日元(约合人民币5.6亿元)，日本政府希望，从新增日美联合训练项目、强化日美同盟的角度获得理解。
translated_claim: Since 2022, the “protection fee” paid by the United States forces in Japan has increased, with an average of 10 billion yen being paid annually.
translated_evidence: On December 21, China’s new network reported that, around 2022, the Japanese and United States governments agreed on a total of about 1.05 trillion yen (approximately 59.2 billion yen) for five years of spending on the United States military presence in Japan. On average, about 211 billion yen (approximately 11.8 billion yen) per year exceeded the current level.

claim: 2021年12月21日，希奥玛拉·卡斯特罗当选洪都拉斯总统。
evidence: 新华社马那瓜12月20日电（记者吴昊朱雨博）特古西加尔巴消息：洪都拉斯国家选举委员会20日宣布，自由和重建党候选人希奥玛拉・卡斯特罗在上月举行的总统选举中获胜，当选洪都拉斯新一任总统。 洪都拉斯国家选举委员会公布的最终计票结果显示，卡斯特罗获得51.12%的选票，执政党国民党候选人、首都市长纳斯里・阿斯富拉获得36.93%的选票。 按规定，卡斯特罗将于明年1月27日就职。
translated_claim: On 21 December 2021, Chiomala Castro was elected President of Honduras.
translated_evidence: Xinhua Society, Managua, 20 December, Tegucigalpa (journalist U. Zhuyubo): The National Electoral Commission of Honduras announced on 20 December that the candidate of the Freedom and Reconstruction Party, Chiomala Castro, had won the presidential election last month and was elected as the new President of Honduras. The final tally published by the National Electoral Commission of Honduras showed that Castro received 51.12 per cent of the votes and that Nasri Asfora, the candidate of the ruling National Party and mayor of the capital, obtained 36.93 per cent of the votes, and that Castro would take office on 27 January next year, as required.

claim: 世界卫生组织2021年12月20日公布的最新数据显示，全球累计新冠确诊病例达273900334例。
evidence: 世卫组织网站最新数据显示，截至欧洲中部时间20日15时29分(北京时间22时29分)，全球确诊病例较前一日增加504603例，达到273900334例；死亡病例增加5490例，达到5351812例。
translated_claim: According to the latest data released by the World Health Organization on 20 December 2021, the cumulative number of newly diagnosed cases worldwide stands at 273900334.
translated_evidence: According to the latest data from the WHO website, as of 20 hours time in central Europe (22.29 hours Beijing time), the number of confirmed cases worldwide had increased by 504603 compared to the previous day, to 273900334; the number of deaths had increased by 5490, to 5351812.

claim: 2021年12月21日，中国援助津巴布韦第五批新冠疫苗运抵哈拉雷。
evidence: 12月20日下午，中国政府援助津巴布韦的第五批新冠疫苗运抵津首都哈拉雷。
translated_claim: On 21 December 2021, China assisted Zimbabwe in the arrival in Harare of the fifth batch of new crown vaccines.
translated_evidence: On the afternoon of 20 December, the Government of China assisted Zimbabwe with the arrival in Harare of the fifth batch of new crown vaccines.

claim: 2021年12月21日，美国加利福尼亚州彼得罗利亚附近海域发生6.2级地震。
evidence: 据美国地质调查局地震信息网消息，美国加利福尼亚州彼得罗利亚附近海域北京时间21日4时10分发生6.2级地震。
translated_claim: On 21 December 2021, an earthquake of 6.2 magnitude occurred in the waters near Petrolia, California, United States.
translated_evidence: According to the United States Geological Survey Seismic Information Network, an earthquake of 6.2 magnitude occurred at 0410 hours Beijing Time, 21 hours near Petrolia, California, United States of America.

claim: 世界卫生组织总干事谭德塞在日内瓦召开的新闻发布会上表示，2021年新冠肺炎疫情夺走了至少330万人的生命。
evidence: 订阅音频站世界卫生组织总干事谭德塞今天表示，现在有“一致的证据”表明，奥密克戎变异株的传播速度快于德尔塔，新冠疫苗接种者或康复者都有可能感染或再次感染该病毒。 谭德塞12月20日在日内瓦举行的新闻发布会上表示，2021年，新冠疫情夺走了至少330万人的生命，如今每周依然有5万人直接死于新冠病毒。
translated_claim: At a press conference in Geneva, the Director-General of the World Health Organization, Tandessai, stated that the 2021 new coronary pneumonia epidemic claimed at least 3.3 million lives.
translated_evidence: According to World Health Organization (WHO) Director-General Tandessai, subscription to the audio station, there is “consensual evidence” that Omik’s mutagenic strains are spreading faster than Delta, and that either the new crown vaccinator or the recovering person is at risk of contracting or reinfecting the virus. Tandessai, at a press conference held in Geneva on 20 December, stated that the new crown epidemic claimed at least 3.3 million lives in 2021, and that 50,000 people still die directly from the new crown virus every week.

claim: 2021年12月20日，美国华盛顿特区将重新执行室内强制戴口罩规定。
evidence: 当地时间12月20日，美国华盛顿特区市长鲍泽宣布，华盛顿特区将重新实施室内强制要求戴口罩的规定，并将扩大对市政府雇员的新冠疫苗接种规定。
translated_claim: On 20 December 2021, in Washington, D.C., the United States of America will re-implement the mandatory domestic masking requirement.

evidence: (抗击新冠肺炎)柬埔寨再现奥密克戎病例洪森称不会采取“封锁”措施中新社金边12月18日电(记者欧阳开宇)尽管柬埔寨疫情持续得到控制，每日确诊病例数量逐步下滑，但仍受到变异病毒奥密克戎影响，柬埔寨首相洪森强调要加强防控，同时表示不会再采取“封锁”措施。
translated_claim: On December 18, 2021, Cambodia reappeared the case of the Omikrum, and Hun Sen claimed that no “blocking” measures would be taken.
translated_evidence: In Cambodia, where the case of the Omikium case, Hun Sen, who said that no “blocking” measures would be taken, reported that the 18 December electricity in Phnom Penh of the New Society (Reporter Ouyangqiao), despite the continued control of the epidemic in Cambodia and the steady decline in the number of confirmed cases per day, was affected by the mutant Omicron virus, Prime Minister Hun Sen stressed the need to strengthen controls, while saying that no further “blocking” measures would be taken.

claim: 法国杯足球赛1/32决赛于当地时间17日在巴黎沙勒蒂体育场举行，里昂队与巴黎足球俱乐部球队进行角逐，比赛因球迷发生冲突扔燃烧物引发骚乱，被迫中途取消。
evidence: 原标题：球迷发生冲突扔燃烧物引发骚乱，法国杯足球赛被迫中途取消来源：环球网【环球网报道】综合俄新社、“今日俄罗斯”、法新社等媒体报道，法国杯足球赛1/23决赛于当地时间17日在巴黎沙勒蒂体育场举行，里昂队与巴黎足球俱乐部球队进行角逐。 不料比赛因两个球队的球迷发生冲突和骚乱而被迫中断，最终下半场比赛被取消。
translated_claim: The 1/32 finals of the French Cup were held on 17 local time at the Saletti Stadium in Paris, where the Lyons team fought with the Paris Club football team, and the game, which was provoked by a clash of fans who threw incendiary objects, was forced to cancel in the middle of the race.
translated_evidence: Original title: Conflict of fans toss burning things into trouble, France’s football tournament forced midway to cancel the source: Global Net (WCN) combined Russian news, “Russia Today” and French-news. The French football game 1/23 finals were held at the Saletti stadium in Paris on 17 local time, and Lyons fought with the Paris football club team.

claim: 2021年12月18日，受强降雨影响 马来西亚多地发生水灾。
evidence: 受17日起开始的持续降雨影响，马来西亚多地发生不同程度水灾。 马来西亚国家天灾管理委员会18日表示，截至当天上午8时，全国共有来自5个州的428户家庭共计1766名灾民被疏散到12个临时安置点。
translated_claim: On 18 December 2021, heavy rains affected Malaysia, where floods occurred.
translated_evidence: As a result of the continuing rains that began in 17 years, Malaysia experienced a high number of floods of varying degrees, and the Malaysian National Natural Disaster Management Board indicated on 18 that, as at 8 a.m. the same day, a total of 428 families from five states had been evacuated to 12 temporary settlements.

claim: 伊核问题全面协议联合委员会政治总司长级会议在维也纳举行，结束了第七轮美伊恢复履约谈判进程。
evidence: 新华社维也纳12月17日电（记者于涛付一鸣）伊朗核问题全面协议联合委员会政治总司长级会议29日在奥地利首都维也纳举行，重启新一轮美伊恢复履约谈判进程。
translated_claim: The meeting of the Joint Commission on the Comprehensive Agreement on the Iranian Nuclear Issue, at the level of chief political officers, was held in Vienna and concluded the seventh round of the United States-Iraq negotiating process for the resumption of compliance.

claim: 俄媒：普京解释自己不上网原因，“没有时间”。
evidence: 版权数据库生命时报品牌活动环球旅游周刊环球时报公基金会讽刺与幽默舆情中心GlobalTimes来源：环球网作者：张江平2021-12-1809:39【环球网报道】综合俄罗斯《报纸报》、俄新社等媒体报道，俄罗斯总统普京17日在出席俄罗斯工业家和企业家联盟会议时解释自己不使用网络的原因，是“没有时间上网”。

translated_evidence: Global Times, Global Times Foundation, Global Tourism Weekly of the Copyright-based Life Times branding event, Global Times Source: Global Network author: Zhang Jiangping 2021-12-1809:39, synthesizes media reports from Russian newspapers, Russian news agencies, etc. Russian President Vladimir Putin explains why he does not use the Internet when he attends meetings of the Union of Russian Industrialists and Entrepreneurs, which is “no time to access the Internet”.

claim: 一名参与1月6日美国国会骚乱事件的男子被判处五年多的监禁，这是迄今为止对国会大厦暴乱者最长刑期的判决。
evidence: 中新网12月18日电 据美国中文网报道，当地时间17日，一名参与1月6日美国国会骚乱事件的男子被判处五年多的监禁，这是迄今为止对国会大厦暴乱者最长刑期的判决。 证据显示，这名佛州男子在国会大厦用灭火器、木板和杆子等猛烈攻击警察。
translated_claim: A man who was involved in the riots in the United States Congress on 6 January was sentenced to more than five years'imprisonment, the longest sentence to date for rioters in the House of Congress.
translated_evidence: According to the US Chinese Internet, on 17 local time, a man who was involved in the riots in the United States Congress on 6 January was sentenced to more than five years in prison, the longest sentence to date for rioters in the House of Congress. The evidence shows that the man in Florida attacked the police with heavy fire extinguishers, wooden boards and poles in the House of Congress.

claim: 德国凯傲在华投资1.4亿欧元新建叉车工厂。
evidence: 原标题：德国凯傲在华投资1.4亿欧元新建叉车工厂记者17日从全球工业叉车巨头德国凯傲集团获悉，凯傲集团日前为其在中国的新叉车工厂举行了落成典礼，同时为自动化解决方案新工厂举行奠基仪式。 该项目投资总额约为1.4亿欧元，用于未来生产工业车辆和供应链解决方案。
translated_claim: The new forklift factory was invested in China by Kaiju, Germany, in the amount of 140 million euros.
translated_evidence: Former title: The German journalist at the new forklift factory in China, Kaiju, invested 140 million euros in China, learned on 17 days from the global industrial forklift giant, the German Keeju Group, that the Keeju group had recently inaugurated its new forklift factory in China, while setting the stage for a new factory for automated solutions. The total investment in the project was about 140 million euros for the future production of industrial vehicles and supply-chain solutions.

claim: 《联合国反腐败公约》第九届缔约国会议通过沙姆沙伊赫宣言。
evidence: 新华社埃及沙姆沙伊赫12月17日电（记者吴丹妮）《联合国反腐败公约》第九届缔约国会议17日在埃及沙姆沙伊赫闭幕。大会通过沙姆沙伊赫宣言，呼吁各缔约方加强反腐败国际合作，关注由紧急经济和卫生支出带来的腐败风险。
translated_claim: The Sharm el-Sheikh Declaration was adopted at the ninth session of the Conference of the States Parties to the United Nations Convention against Corruption.
translated_evidence: Xinhua Society, Egypt, closed the ninth session of the Conference of the States Parties to the United Nations Convention against Corruption in Sharm el-Sheikh, Egypt, on 17 December, when the General Assembly adopted the Sharm el-Sheikh Declaration, which called on all parties to strengthen international cooperation against corruption and to pay attention to the risks of corruption arising from emergency economic and health expenditures.

claim: 俄总统新闻秘书：普京尚未决定是否参加2024年总统大选。
evidence: 原标题：俄总统新闻秘书：普京尚未决定是否参加2024年总统大选当地时间17日，俄罗斯总统新闻秘书佩斯科夫表示，普京还没有决定是否参加2024年的俄罗斯总统大选。 “至少他还没有明确表示”，佩斯科夫说。
translated_claim: Russian Presidential Press Secretary: Putin has yet to decide whether to vote in the 2024 presidential election.
translated_evidence: Former title: Russian Presidential Press Secretary: Putin has yet to decide whether to take part in the 2024 presidential election on the local date of 17, and Russian Presidential Press Secretary Peskov has said that Putin has yet to decide whether to take part in the 2024 Russian presidential election. “At least he has not made it clear,” Peskov says.

claim: 马来西亚前总理马哈蒂尔住院。
evidence: 原标题：马来西亚前总理马哈蒂尔住院中新社吉隆坡12月17日电(记者陈悦)马来西亚国家心脏中心16日深夜发声明证实，现年96岁的前总理马哈蒂尔16日晚进入该中心并接受数项“身体检查”，且将“留院观察”。
translated_claim: The former Prime Minister of Malaysia, Mahathir, was hospitalized.
translated_evidence: Original title: The late 16 night statement by the Malaysian National Heart Centre, dated 17 December, from Kuala Lumpur, where Malaysia's former Prime Minister, Mahathir, was hospitalized, confirmed that former Prime Minister Mahathir, age 96, entered the Centre on the night of 16 and underwent several “body examinations” and that he would be “retentioned for observation”.

claim: 2021年12月17日，日本大阪一大厦发生火灾 已造成27人心肺功能停止。
evidence: 报道称，当地时间17日10时20分，位于大阪北区曾根崎新地的一栋八层大厦的四层发现火情。  原标题：日本大阪一大厦发生火灾，已致27人心肺功能停止来源：新华社据日本媒体报道，日本大阪市一大厦17日发生火灾，已造成27人心肺功能停止。
translated_claim: On December 17, 2021, a fire in one building in Osaka, Japan, caused 27 human lungs to stop functioning.

claim: 2021泰国艺术双年展17日在泰国东北部呵叻府开幕，来自全球25个国家和地区的53位艺术家参展。
evidence: 原标题：泰国艺术双年展吸引全球50多位艺术家参展长谷川佑子（YukoHasegawa）在开幕式上致辞赵婧楠摄中新网泰国呵叻府12月17日电(赵婧楠)2021泰国艺术双年展17日在泰国东北部呵叻府开幕，来自全球25个国家和地区的53位艺术家参展。

translated_evidence: Original title: Thailand's two-year art exhibition, which attracted more than 50 artists from around the world, Yuko Hasegawa, opened the opening ceremony with 53 artists from 25 countries and regions around the world.

claim: 第四届中国(宝鸡)国际机器人暨智能制造展览会马来西亚分会场吸引超100多家本地企业以线上线下形式参与。

translated_claim: The 4th China International Robotic and Smart Manufacturing Fair in Malaysia attracted more than 100 local firms to participate online and offline.
translated_evidence: The Malaysian branch of the Fourth China International Robotic and Smart Manufacturing Fair, held on December 17, 16, in Kuala Lumpur (journalist Chen Jing), attracted more than 100 local firms to participate online and offline, and the Malaysian industry expressed its expectations for enhanced cooperation in technology and, in particular, in the smart manufacturing sector. The Malaysian chapter was set up jointly by the Malaysian Institute and the Malaysian International Chamber of Commerce.

claim: 七国集团：奥密克戎毒株是当前全球公共卫生“最大威胁”。
evidence: 新华社伦敦12月16日电七国集团卫生部长16日举行会议后发表联合声明说，变异新冠病毒奥密克戎毒株是全球公共卫生领域当前面临的“最大威胁”，各国“密切合作”应对疫情比以往任何时候都更加重要。
translated_claim: Group of Seven: The Omicone strain is the current “largest threat” to global public health.
translated_evidence: Xinhua Society issued a joint statement following the 16th meeting of the G-7 Health Ministers in London on 16 December, stating that the transformation of the Omicium strain of the new crown virus is the “largest threat” facing the world's public health today, and that it is more important than ever for countries to “cooperate closely” in their response to the epidemic.

claim: 美国国会参议院批准伯恩斯出任驻华大使。

translated_claim: The Senate of the United States Congress authorized Burns to serve as Ambassador to China.
translated_evidence: On 16 December, the Senate of the United States Congress in Washington, D.C. (Reporter Yang) approved, by a vote of 75 votes to 18, the nomination by President Biden of former senior diplomat, Professor Nicholas Burns of Harvard University, as Ambassador to China.

claim: 2021年12月17日的一周内，土耳其假酒已致26人中毒死亡。
evidence: 中新网12月17日电综合外媒报道，截至目前的一周内，土耳其假酒已造成26人中毒死亡，24人正在住院，死亡人数可能会进一步增加。

translated_evidence: On 17 December, China-News Network reported that, as of the current week, 26 people had died of poisoning from fake alcohol in Turkey, 24 were in hospital and the death toll was likely to increase further.

claim: 素媛案罪犯在家中遇袭 被陌生男子拿钝器打破头。

The Korean media took pictures of Zhao Do-sung’s head with a sticker, which was investigated and left the police station.

On December 16, local time of the Chinese news agency Paris (journalist Li Yang), France diagnosed 310 cases of infection with the Omician strain of the new coronary virus. The official French government announced on the same day that British travel controls would be tightened in order to curb the spread of the Omico strain.

claim: 2021年12月17日，被海地黑帮绑架两个月 17名美加传教士全部获释。
evidence: 中新网12月17日电据美国中文网报道，当地时间16日，美国俄亥俄州的一个名为“基督教援助部”的教会组织宣布，历经两个月，该组织在海地被绑架的17名传教士已全部获释。

translated_evidence: On 17 December, Chinese-Chinese Internet reported that on 16 local time, a church organization called the Christian Aid Department in Ohio, United States, had announced that, two months later, 17 missionaries abducted by the organization in Haiti had been released.

claim: 美副总统哈里斯：从未与拜登讨论过2024竞选连任问题。
evidence: 中新网12月17日电综合美媒报道，美国副总统哈里斯15日对美国《华尔街日报》表示，她从未与总统拜登讨论过，后者是否计划在2024年竞选连任的问题。 此前白宫曾多次表示，拜登确实计划竞选连任。
translated_claim: U.S. Vice President Harris: Never discussed with Biden the issue of 2024 for re-election.
translated_evidence: On December 17, China-News Network reported that US Vice President Harris 15 told the American Wall Street Journal that she had never discussed with President Biden whether the latter planned to run for re-election in 2024. The White House had stated on several occasions that Biden did indeed plan to run for re-election.

claim: 加拿大多处原住民寄宿学校旧址发现大量儿童遗骸事件，加拿大原住民曾经遭受种族灭绝。
evidence: 原标题：原住民寄宿学校发现215具儿童遗骸，特鲁多：加拿大历史上黑暗而可耻的一章（观察者网讯）5月27日，加拿大一处印第安人寄宿学校旧址发现了215具孩童遗骸，使得加拿大对原住民实行种族灭绝的黑暗历史再次引发社会关注。
translated_claim: Large numbers of remains of children have been found at the old sites of Aboriginal boarding schools in Canada, where First Nations have been subjected to genocide.
translated_evidence: Original title: The discovery of 215 remains of children in Aboriginal boarding schools, Trudeau: A dark and shameful chapter in Canadian history (Observant Net) on 27 May, the discovery of 215 remains of children at an old site in an Indian boarding school in Canada again raised social concerns about Canada's dark history of genocide against First Nations.

claim: 2021年12月17日，极端天气再袭美国中部地区1人死亡。
evidence: 新华社芝加哥12月16日电（记者徐静）据美国当地媒体16日报道，极端天气15日晚再次袭击美国中部地区多个州，强风暴扬起尘暴，引燃山火，摧毁输电线路，致1人死亡，51万户家庭停电。
translated_claim: On 17 December 2021, extreme weather struck the central part of the United States, killing another person.
translated_evidence: Xinhua Society called Chicago on 16 December (journalist Xu Jing), according to 16 United States local media reports, the extreme weather struck several states in the central part of the United States again on the night of 15, raising dust storms, setting fire to mountains, destroying transmission lines, killing one person and blacking out 510,000 homes.

claim: 2021年12月17日，非洲累计新冠确诊病例超900万 第四波疫情蔓延。
evidence: 新华社亚的斯亚贝巴12月16日电（记者汪平）非洲疾病预防控制中心15日发布数据显示，非洲累计新冠确诊病例达9033788例，累计死亡225489例，累计治愈8265327例。 非洲疾控中心在9日举行的例行发布会上说，第四轮新冠疫情正在非洲大陆蔓延，截至9日的一周，非洲地区新增新冠确诊病例超过9.88万例，较前一周飙升88%。
translated_claim: On December 17, 2021, Africa accumulated more than 9 million newly diagnosed cases, with a fourth outbreak spreading.
translated_evidence: According to data released by the Xinhua Society's Africa Center for Disease Prevention and Control on 16 December in Addis Ababa (journalist Wang Ping), the cumulative number of new cases diagnosed in Africa is 903378, the cumulative number of deaths is 225489 and the cumulative number of cures is 826,5327.ACCD reported at its routine launch meeting on 9 that the fourth round of new diseases is spreading across the African continent, with more than 98.8 million new cases diagnosed in the African region as of the week of 9 September, up 88 per cent from the previous week.

claim: 匈牙利、西班牙、立陶宛、希腊、意大利等欧洲国家15日开始为5至11岁儿童接种新冠疫苗。
evidence: 新华社布达佩斯12月16日电综合新华社驻欧洲地区记者报道：在新冠病毒感染率不断上升、奥密克戎变异毒株迅速扩散的阴影下，匈牙利、西班牙、立陶宛、希腊、意大利等欧洲国家15日开始为5至11岁儿童接种新冠疫苗，德国和斯洛文尼亚相关接种活动已分别于13日和14日展开，拉脱维亚等国的儿童疫苗接种也将于近日启动。 欧洲药品管理局11月下旬建议批准将低剂量的辉瑞新冠疫苗用于5至11岁儿童。
translated_claim: European countries such as Hungary, Spain, Lithuania, Greece and Italy began vaccination of new crowns for children between 5 and 11 years of age.
translated_evidence: Xinhua, Budapest, 16 December, Xinhua, Xinhua, a regional Xinhua newspaper in Europe, reported that, in the shadow of the rising infection rate of the new coronary virus and the rapid spread of the strain of the Omikium mutineer, 15 European countries, including Hungary, Spain, Lithuania, Greece, Italy, began vaccination of the new coronary for children between 5 and 11 years of age, Germany and Slovenia, respectively, on 13 and 14 December, and children’s vaccinations in Latvia, among others, will be launched in the near future. In late November, the European Drug Administration recommended approval of a low-dose Pfizer vaccine for children between 5 and 11 years of age.

claim: 2021年12月16日，印尼首现奥密克戎确诊病例。
evidence: 中新社雅加达12月16日电(记者林永传)印尼卫生部长萨迪金16日通报，该国已确认首例新冠病毒奥密克戎变异株感染病例，尚未发现该变异病毒的社区传播。 该病例为雅加达亚运村新冠隔离医院员工。 本月8日该医院3名员工新冠病毒检测呈阳性，10日对检测出阳性的样本进行全基因组测序。
translated_claim: On 16 December 2021, the first confirmed case of Omikrum was diagnosed in Indonesia.
translated_evidence: On December 16, Sadikin, Indonesia’s Minister of Health, reported that the country has confirmed the first case of infection with the new coronary virus, Omikium, which has yet to be detected in the community. The case is for employees of the new coronary isolation hospital in the village of Jakarta, where three employees of the hospital were tested positive for the new coronary virus on December 8th, and a full genomic sequence was conducted on 10th.

claim: 2021年12月16日，大韩航空发布“无人机集群飞机外观检查系统”。
evidence: 中新网首尔12月16日电(记者刘旭)当地时间16日，大韩航空举办路演活动，发布“无人机集群飞机外观检查系统”。
translated_claim: On 16 December 2021, Korea Air launched the “Aircraft Cluster Appearance Inspection System”.
translated_evidence: On 16 December, in Seoul, China and New China (journalist Liu Xu), local time, on 16 December, Korean Airlines organized a road show to launch the “Aircraft Cluster Appearance Inspection System”.

claim: 俄罗斯再次试射“锆石”高超音速导弹 明年列装海军。
evidence: 俄罗斯再次试射“锆石”高超音速导弹明年列装海军中新社莫斯科12月16日电（记者田冰）俄罗斯国防部16日宣布，俄北方舰队“戈尔什科夫海军元帅”号护卫舰再次成功进行了“锆石”高超音速导弹试射。 俄罗斯媒体当天援引俄国防部通报报道称，作为完成高超音速导弹武器试验周期的一部分，北方舰队“戈尔什科夫海军元帅”号护卫舰在白海水域再次进行了“锆石”高超音速导弹试射，导弹成功命中位于阿尔汉格尔斯克州赤扎靶场的目标。 “锆石”在完成测试任务后，将于明年列装俄海军。
translated_claim: The Russians are again trying to launch a high-sonic missile called "Stepstone" next year in the navy.
translated_evidence: The Russian Ministry of Defence announced on 16 December next year that the frigate of the northern Russian fleet “Goshkov Navy Marshal” had again successfully conducted the test of the high-sonic missile. The Russian media quoted the Russian Ministry of Defence that day’s report that, as part of the completion of the high-sonic missile-testing cycle, the northern fleet “Goshkov Navy Marshal” had again tested the high-sonic missile in the White Sea waters, and that the missile had been successfully targeted at the Alhangalsk State Tsizza range.

claim: 2020年韩首尔婚姻登记数量创20年最低 新生儿减幅超6成。
evidence: 中新网12月16日电据韩国国际广播电台(KBS)报道，根据韩国首尔市公布的2000年至2020年人口动向分析结果显示，在过去20年间，首尔市的婚姻登记数量约减少一半，创下最低值。 出生人口与2000年相比，更是减少了约64%。
translated_claim: In 2020, the number of marriages registered in Seoul was the lowest in 20 years and the number of newborns decreased by more than 60 percent.
translated_evidence: According to the Korea International Radio (KBS) on 16 December, according to an analysis of population trends from 2000 to 2020 published by Seoul, Korea, the number of marriages registered in Seoul has been reduced by about half, to the lowest value, over the past 20 years. The number of births has decreased by about 64% compared to 2000.

claim: 2021年12月16日，印度尼西亚首现奥密克戎确诊病例 无海外旅行史。
evidence: 中新网12月16日电据路透社报道，当地时间16日，印度尼西亚卫生部长布迪·古纳迪·萨迪金表示，印尼已确认首例新冠病毒奥密克戎变异株感染病例。 中新社记者林永传摄报道称，印尼当局在当地时间15日晚发现此病例，该患者是雅加达一医院的员工，并且没有海外旅行史。
translated_claim: On December 16, 2021, the first confirmed case of Omik Dynasty in Indonesia had no history of overseas travel.
translated_evidence: On 16 December, China News Network reported by Reuters that on 16 local time, the Indonesian Minister of Health, Boudi Gunadi Sadikin, stated that Indonesia had confirmed the first case of infection with the new coronary virus Omikium. According to a Chinese news agency journalist, Lin Yong, the Indonesian authorities discovered the case on the night of 15 local time, that the patient was an employee of a Jakarta hospital and had no history of travelling abroad.

claim: 2021年12月16日，希腊再现5例奥密克戎确诊病例 入境又出新规定。
evidence: 中新网12月16日电据希腊《中希时报》报道，当地时间15日，希腊新增5例新冠病毒奥密克戎变异株确诊病例，同日，希腊宣布，国际旅客都必须持48小时内的核酸阴性证明方可入境。
translated_claim: On December 16, 2021, five more Omikium confirmed cases were reported in Greece, and new regulations were introduced to enter the country.
translated_evidence: On the same day, Greece announced that international passengers were required to carry negative nucleic acid certificates within 48 hours to enter the country.

claim: 拜登提名前总统肯尼迪之女任美国驻澳大利亚大使。
evidence: 拜登提名前总统肯尼迪之女任美国驻澳大利亚大使中新网12月16日电据外媒报道，美国白宫当地时间15日表示，总统拜登提名卡罗琳・肯尼迪担任美国驻澳大利亚大使。 据报道，现年64岁的卡罗琳・肯尼迪是1963年被刺杀的美国第35任总统约翰・肯尼迪的女儿。
translated_claim: Biden nominated the daughter of former President Kennedy as the United States Ambassador to Australia.
translated_evidence: Biden nominated former President John F. Kennedy’s daughter as the United States Ambassador to Australia on 16 December, as reported by outside media, and on 15 local United States White House time, President Biden nominated Caroline Kennedy as the United States Ambassador to Australia. Caroline Kennedy, now 64, is reported to be the daughter of the 35th United States President John F. Kennedy, who was assassinated in 1963.

claim: 世卫组织：奥密克戎毒株或使疫苗有效性减弱。
evidence: 新华社北京12月16日电世界卫生组织15日说，初步证据显示，变异新冠病毒奥密克戎毒株可能使新冠疫苗有效性减弱，并且人们重复感染这一毒株的风险更高。
translated_claim: WHO: Omikium strains or reduced vaccine effectiveness.
translated_evidence: According to the World Health Organization (WHO) on 16 December in Beijing, Xinhua stated that preliminary evidence showed that the mutation of the Omicium strain of the new coronary virus could reduce the effectiveness of the new coronary vaccine and that there was a higher risk of repeated infections of the strain.

claim: 日本一男性欲杀死掉入陷阱的野猪却被咬伤 最终身亡。
evidence: 中新网12月16日电综合日媒报道，当地时间15日上午，日本茨城县常陆大宫市，一男性欲杀死被困在陷阱中的野猪，却被它咬伤，最终身亡。
translated_claim: A Japanese man who tried to kill a wild boar who fell into a trap was bitten and eventually killed.
translated_evidence: On 16 December, China-USN reported that on the 15th morning of local time, in the city of Changjio, Tsang County, Japan, a man who tried to kill a wild boar trapped in a trap had been bitten and eventually killed.

claim: 当地时间2021年12月15日晚，武装人员占领位于的黎波里的民族团结政府总部和国防部大厦。
evidence: 中新网12月16日电据俄罗斯卫星网援引利比亚当地媒体报道，当地时间12月15日晚，武装人员占领位于的黎波里的民族团结政府总部和国防部大厦。 据报道，武装人员12月15日晚冲入位于的黎波里的民族团结政府总部和国防部大厦。
translated_claim: On the evening of 15 December 2021 local time, armed men occupied the headquarters of the Government of National Unity and the Ministry of Defence building in Tripoli.
translated_evidence: On the evening of 15 December local Libyan media reports quoted by the Russian satellite network on 16 December, when armed men took over the headquarters of the Government of National Unity and the Ministry of Defence building in Tripoli, were reported to have stormed the headquarters of the Government of National Unity and the Ministry of Defence building in Tripoli on the night of 15 December.

claim: 中国政府对古巴紧急抗疫援助项目交接仪式在哈瓦那举行。
evidence: 新华社哈瓦那12月15日电（记者林朝晖）中国政府对古巴紧急抗疫援助项目交接仪式15日在古巴公共卫生部举行，中国驻古巴大使马辉与古巴公共卫生部长波塔尔·米兰达共同出席，古外贸外资部副部长里瓦斯与马辉共同签署项目交接证书。
translated_claim: The handover ceremony for the Government of China's emergency anti-epidemic assistance to Cuba was held in Havana.
translated_evidence: Xinhua Society held a ceremony on 15 December in Havana on the occasion of the handover of the Government of China's emergency anti-epidemic assistance programme to Cuba, held at the Ministry of Public Health of Cuba, with the participation of the Chinese Ambassador to Cuba, Ma Fai, and the Minister of Public Health of Cuba, Bertar Miranda, and with the signing of the certificate of transfer by the Vice-Minister for Foreign Affairs and Foreign Affairs of Cuba, Rivas, and Ma Fai.

claim: 韩国高考题目出错 出题负责人道歉并辞职。
evidence: 南博一2021-12-1522:19当地时间12月15日，韩国高考出题负责人就出错题道歉。 据韩联社15日报道，韩国教育课程评价院院长姜泰重当天在政府世宗办公大楼举行记者会，就2022年度高考科目之一——生命科学2有一考题出错一事道歉并宣布引咎辞职。
translated_claim: An error was made in the subject of the South Korean competitive examination, and the head of the investigation apologized and resigned.
translated_evidence: On December 15, local time, South Bob I2021-12-1522:19, the head of the high-testing in Korea apologized for the error. According to the 15th report of the Korean Associates, the president of the Korean School of Education Evaluation held a press conference in the government Sejong’s office building on the same day, to apologize for an error in the life sciences, one of the subjects of the 2022 high-tests, and to announce his resignation.

claim: 丹麦王储妃新冠病毒检测结果呈阳性。
evidence: 中国新闻网当地时间12月15日，据丹麦广播电视台报道，丹麦王储妃玛丽15日新冠病毒检测结果呈阳性，家中其他人未发现感染。
translated_claim: The Crown Princess of Denmark tested positive for the new coronary virus.
translated_evidence: On 15 December, local Chinese News Network, Danish Radio and Television reported that Princess Mary of Denmark had tested positive for a new coronary virus on 15 December and that no infection had been detected in the family.

claim: ，联合国秘书长发言人新冠病毒检测结果呈阳性。
evidence: 当地时间12月15日，联合国秘书长发言人迪雅里克(StephaneDujarric)发邮件告知各国记者，他在当天早些时候的常规新冠核酸检测中，测试结果呈阳性。 迪雅里克称将会根据医疗指导开始进行自我隔离。
translated_claim: The Spokesman for the Secretary-General of the United Nations tested positive for the new coronary virus.
translated_evidence: On 15 December, local time, the Spokesman for the Secretary-General of the United Nations, Stephane Dujaric, sent an e-mail to journalists informing them that he had tested positive during the routine new coronary nucleic acid test earlier that day. Diarick said that he would begin self-segregation under medical guidance.

claim: 美弗洛伊德案主犯肖万就联邦指控认罪 或获刑25年。
evidence: 中新社纽约12月15日电当地时间15日，美国弗洛伊德案主犯德雷克·肖万(DerekChauvin)在明尼苏达州圣保罗联邦地区法院，就其受到的有关侵犯民权的指控认罪。 检方建议法官判处肖万25年监禁。 据美联社报道，明尼苏达州前警察肖万当天身着橙色囚服、戴手铐出庭，他承认在处理弗洛伊德案以及2017年的一起案件时使用不当武力、故意剥夺当事人公民权利。 在变更认罪听证会上，他就每项联邦指控都向法官确认自己有罪。 检方建议对肖万处以可适用的最高刑期25年。
translated_claim: Mr. Shawn, the main suspect in the McFreud case, pleaded guilty to a federal charge or was sentenced to 25 years' imprisonment.
translated_evidence: The prosecution recommended that the judge sentence Shawan to 25 years’ imprisonment. According to the Associated Press, Shawan, a former Minnesota policeman, appeared in court that day in orange uniform and handcuffed, admitted to using undue force and deliberately depriving him of his civil rights in the Freud case and in a case in 2017.

claim: 2021年12月16日，马来西亚南部海域发生印尼移民船难 致11死25失踪。
evidence: 中新社吉隆坡12月16日电据马新社报道，位于马来西亚南部的柔佛州哥打丁宜外海当地时间15日凌晨因恶劣天气发生一起船难。 马来西亚军方的声明称，失事船只上载有约50名来自印度尼西亚的非法移民，其中11人死亡，14人获救，25人失踪。
translated_claim: On 16 December 2021, an Indonesian migrant boat in the southern waters of Malaysia lost 11 dead and 25 disappeared.
translated_evidence: On 16 December, Kuala Lumpur, the Central News Agency reported a boat crash in the early hours of 15 a.m., off the coast of Tingyi, Johor State, south of Malaysia, due to bad weather, a statement by the Malaysian military stating that some 50 illegal immigrants from Indonesia had been on board the wreck, 11 of whom had died, 14 had been rescued and 25 had disappeared.

claim: 2021年12月16日，欧盟经济复苏步履维艰。
evidence: 欧盟经济复苏步履维艰据报道，欧洲议会日前通过了欧盟2022年预算，旨在努力应对疫情影响、尽快恢复经济增长，同时聚集欧洲未来发展优先事项，大幅增加财政资源。 分析认为，新预算展现了欧盟各国抗击疫情、发展经济的信心，但随着新一轮疫情在全欧洲蔓延，未来将面临更多不确定性因素。
translated_claim: On 16 December 2021, the European Union experienced a difficult economic recovery.
translated_evidence: The European Union’s economic recovery is reported to have been difficult, and the European Parliament has recently adopted the EU 2022 budget, which seeks to address the impact of the epidemic, restore economic growth as soon as possible, and bring together Europe’s future development priorities and substantially increase financial resources. The analysis suggests that the new budget demonstrates confidence in the EU countries to fight the epidemic and develop their economies, but that the future will face additional uncertainties as the new epidemic spreads across Europe.

claim: 2021年12月25日，马来西亚水灾已致46人死亡 逾400灾民确诊新冠肺炎。
evidence: 马来西亚官方25日称，近期发生的严重水灾已造成46人死亡、5人失踪。 此外，已有405位灾民经检测确诊新冠肺炎。 马来西亚警方负责人25日说，截至当日上午10时，这场影响马来西亚多州的严重水灾已造成雪兰莪州25人死亡、彭亨州18人死亡、吉兰丹州3人死亡，彭亨州还有5人至今下落不明。 警方并介绍，截至25日凌晨，仍有逾4.8万民众因水灾被安置在疏散中心。 马卫生部长哈伊里25日称，截至24日，在受检测灾民中已确诊405例新冠肺炎病例。
translated_claim: On 25 December 2021, floods in Malaysia killed 46 people and diagnosed new coronary pneumonia among more than 400 people.
translated_evidence: Malaysia’s official 25th day said that the recent severe flooding had resulted in 46 deaths and 5 disappearances. Moreover, 405 affected people had been diagnosed with new coronary pneumonia.

claim: 2021年12月25日，中俄学者发布联合研究报告 共议应对中亚安全风险的路径选择。
evidence: 中国社会科学院俄罗斯东欧中亚研究所与俄罗斯国际事务委员会24日在北京联合发布《阿富汗变局下应对中亚安全风险：中国与俄罗斯的路径选择》研究报告。 报告重点就阿富汗变局可能引发的风险与挑战、中俄如何维护地区安全等进行分析和阐述。 报告认为，中俄作为负责任的大国，在完善全球治理体系、推动构建国际新秩序、维护地区安全稳定方面发挥着重要作用。 未来两国应在推动恢复阿富汗重建和维护中亚地区局势方面进一步加强合作。
translated_claim: On 25 December 2021, Russian and Chinese scholars published a joint study on options for addressing security risks in Central Asia.
translated_evidence: China’s Academy of Social Sciences, the Russian Institute for Eastern Europe and Central Asia, jointly with the Russian Committee for International Affairs, launched a study in Beijing entitled “Responding to Central Asia’s Security Risks under Afghanistan Change: China’s and Russia’s Path Options.” The study focuses on analysing and elaborating the risks and challenges that the Afghanistan Change Authority may pose, and how Russia and China can maintain regional security.

claim: 美国宣布2021年底解除针对南非等八国旅行限制。
evidence: 美国白宫24日表示，美国将于12月31日解除针对南非等非洲八国的旅行限制。 白宫助理新闻秘书凯文·穆尼奥斯(Kevin Munoz)当天通过社交媒体宣布了这一消息。 他说，这一决定是根据美国疾控中心的建议作出的。 为应对新冠变异病毒奥密克戎毒株，美国11月26日宣布对南非、博茨瓦纳、莫桑比克、纳米比亚、莱索托等8个非洲国家实施旅行限制。 穆尼奥斯表示，这一临时性的旅行禁令为科学家研究奥密克戎毒株争取了时间。
translated_claim: The United States announced the lifting of travel restrictions against eight countries, including South Africa, by the end of 2021.
translated_evidence: The White House of the United States stated on 24 December that the United States would lift travel restrictions on eight African countries, including South Africa. Kevin Munoz, the White House’s Assistant Press Secretary, announced the news in social media that day.

claim: 2021年12月25日，一美军士兵因酒驾在冲绳被捕 所属基地正发生集体感染。
evidence: 据日媒报道，25日，日本冲绳县警方逮捕了一名涉嫌酒驾的驻日美军士兵，经调查发现，该士兵来自正在发生新冠集体感染的汉森军营。 据报道，被捕士兵名为米克曼，现年24岁。 当地时间25日凌晨，米克曼在那霸市驾驶摩托车时因没带头盔，被巡警拦下。 随后，他被检出体内酒精含量超标3倍。 据介绍，二人都来自美国海军陆战队汉森军营，该军营近日暴发新冠病毒集体感染。
translated_claim: On 25 December 2021, an American soldier was arrested in Okinawa for drinking and driving, and a mass infection was taking place at his base.
translated_evidence: According to Japanese media reports, on 25 November, Japanese police in Okinawa County arrested an American soldier suspected of drinking and driving from the Hansen military camp, where he was found to be in the midst of a new coronary infection. The arrested soldier was reportedly named Mikman, now 24 years old.

claim: 美国是全球疫情扩散的主要推手。
